GV06apastgcu:151: etacca sāmānyavidhānaṃ tatra tatra viśeṣavidhānenāpodyate niyamyate ca /

GV06apastgcu:159: ityatra caulavikāratvādeva godānasya udagayanaprāptau punastatra tadvidhiḥ tadvikārāntare samāvartane udagayananiyamānivṛttyartha iti gamyate /

GV06apastgcu:220: na cātra upakrāmāpavargayoḥ samānabhidaṃ niyamanaṃ kriyate-purastādupakrānte tatraiva samāpyaṃ udagārabhyaṃ ca tatraiveti /
GV06apastgcu:221: kiṃ tarhi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pravṛttiḥ tadyathā paristaraṇasya purastādupakrāntasya tatraivāpavargāsambavādudagapavargaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:230: anyathā pradakṣiṇaparibhāṣayā sāmānyaparibhāṣā bādhyate kiñciddaivāni karmāṇīti tatra viśeṣitam /
GV06apastgcu:253: idaṃ tu niyamanaṃ yāni gayāśrāddhādīni deśaviśeṣeṇa pātraviśeṣeṇa kāmyānyupadiṣṭāni asmābhiśca parigṛhītānipārvaṇe nātonyānītyatra teṣavaparapakṣaprāptyartha ca /
GV06apastgcu:254: tena pūrvapakṣe mṛtasyāparapakṣa ekoddiṣṭaṃ kartavyaṃ na tvekādaśe 'hani /
GV06apastgcu:258: ayaṃ cāparapakṣavidhiḥ kṛtsnasyodagayanāderapavādo na pūrvasmādudagvā yathāyogam /
GV06apastgcu:262: ucyate-'yajñopavītinā pradakṣiṇaṃ''tathāpavarga'ityetāḥ paribhāṣā aviśeṣeṇātra prakaraṇe paṭhitāḥ sāmānyaparibhāṣāyā bādhitatvāt pitryeṣvapi prāpnuvanti tadvādhārthamidam /
GV06apastgcu:263: atra ca yeṣāṃ pitryāṇāṃ svātantryeṇa svakole pravṛttiḥ teṣāmevāyaṃ prācīnāvītavidhiḥ natvanyatrāṅgatvena prayujyamānānām /
GV06apastgcu:264: tena daiveṣi mānuṣeṣu ca karmasu“pitaraḥ pitāmahā“ityatra yajñopavītameva bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:266: . iti darśanāt“pitaraḥ pitāmahā“ityasyāpi pitryatvādeva prācīnāvītasyāprasaṅgaḥ iti /
GV06apastgcu:268: abhihitaṃ prācīnāvītamaviśeṣeṇa pitrye karmāṇi sāṅge pravartate /
GV06apastgcu:269: tena pitrye ājyabhāgante karmaṇi jayādau ca prācīnāvītameva bhavati //

GV06apastgcu:418: yatra tu psiddhau'gnirnāsti tatra śrautriyāgārādāharaṇaṃ mathanaṃ vā /

GV06apastgcu:519: uttareṇāgniṃ darbhāntsaṃstīrya dvandvaṃ nyañci pātrāṇi prayunakti devasaṃyuktāni // ĀpGs_1.16 /

GV06apastgcu:528: tatra yāni devasaṃyuktāni tāni dvandvaṃ prayunakti /
GV06apastgcu:532: jñāpakārtha caitat jñāpayati-agniparistaraṇe vihito 'yaṃ pātraprayoge nānuvartate iti /
GV06apastgcu:535: tena pitryeṣvapi prāgagrāṇāmeva saṃstaraṇaṃ agneścottarataḥ tantrābhāve ca pātraprayogābhāvāt /
GV06apastgcu:559: na;daivāni hi karmāṇi dvividhāni-puruṣārtharūpāṇi manuṣyasaṃskārakāṇi ca /
GV06apastgcu:565: yāni manuṣyasaṃyuktāni pātrāṇi tāni sakṛdeva prayunakti,
GV06apastgcu:569: pātra bāhulyāt dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ sādanāśaktāvapyupāyena sakṛdeva sādanamiti /
GV06apastgcu:575: manuṣyasaṃyuktāni manuṣyadvārā saṃyuktāni aśmavāsomekhalādīni sakṛdeva kriyābhyāvṛttiparihāreṇa prayunakti,
GV06apastgcu:584: pitṛkarmārthāni darvyādīni svadhāpātrādīni ca ekamokaṃ prayunakti //18//
GV06apastgcu:586: pavitrayossaṃkāra āyāmataḥ parīmāṇaṃ prokṣaṇīsaṃskāraḥ pātraprokṣa iti darśapūrṇamāsavattūṣṇīm // ĀpGs_1.19 //
GV06apastgcu:590: tayorāyāmato yat parimāṇaṃ dīrghapramāṇaṃ prādeśamātrā (āpa.śrau.1-11-9.) vityetat /
GV06apastgcu:597: yathā prokṣaṇe pātrāṇāmuktā kriyā visraṃsanañcedhmasyatadantarbhāvādeva siddham /
GV06apastgcu:598: idaṃ tu vacanaṃ niyamārtham-pavitrayorevāyāmata- parimāṇaṃ yathā syāt
GV06apastgcu:602: āyāmagrahaṇamāyāmaparimāṇasyaiva pavitrayorniyamena ya vā saṃkhyāparīmāṇaṃ dārśapūrṇamāsikamevedhmasya bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:609: tṛṇaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ vāntardhāya chinatti, na nakhena /
GV06apastgcu:615: yadyapi 'pavitrayossaṃskāro darśapūrṇamāsavat'iti vacanādeva tadvadāyāmataḥ parimāṇaṃ prāptam,
GV06apastgcu:616: tathāpi yadāyāmataḥ parmāmaṃ prādeśamātrāviti tadeva tadvat,
GV06apastgcu:617: na tviha pṛthutvenāpi sāmyamityevamartha 'āyāmataḥ parimāṇam'iti punarvacanam //
GV06apastgcu:619: na tvidhmasya darbhāgrayoścājye pratyasyamānayoriti niyamārtha punarvacanam /
GV06apastgcu:620: evaṃ bruvataiva sūtrakāreṇa darśapūrṇamāsavattūṣṇīmidhmasya darbhāgrayośca saṃskāra- prasiddha vadabhyanujñātaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:622: tena khādiraḥ pālāso vā śulvasannaddha idhmo visrasya triḥ prokṣitavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:626: atra ca yadyapyayamarthaḥ 'āyāmataḥ'iti vā 'parimāṇaṃ'iti vānyatareṇa siddhaḥ tathāpi niyamāntarārthamevamuktam /
GV06apastgcu:627: āyāmata eva yatparimāṇaṃ tadeva pavitrayoḥ darśapūrṇamāsavat,
GV06apastgcu:632: tathāpyetadvalāttatsthāne jayādayaḥ kalpyāḥ- ityāyuktaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ca pūrvavyākhyānenānyathāsiddhe 'pi sūtre kalpayanti //
GV06apastgcu:634: udagagrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāṃ antarhitāyāṃ vekaṅkatyāṃ snucyapa ānīya tābhyāṃ trirutpūya prokṣet /
GV06apastgcu:636: uttānāni pātrāṇi kṛtvedhmaṃ ca visrasya tābhissapavitreṇa pāṇinā triḥ prokṣet //19//
GV06apastgcu:638: apareṇāgniṃ pavitrāntarhite pātre 'pa ānīyodagagrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāṃ trirutpūya samaṃ prāṇairhṛtvottareṇāgniṃ darbheṣu sādayitvā darbhaiḥ pracchādya // ĀpGs_1.20 //
GV06apastgcu:641: pātraprokṣaṇānantaramapareṇāgniṃ praṇītārthepāno pavitraṃ nidhāya tasminnudagagre pavitre antardhāyāpa ānīyya pavitrābhyāṃ udagagrābhyāṃ trirutpunāti prāgapavargam /
GV06apastgcu:652: agneradūreṇa paścāt pavitrāntarhite kasmiṃścit pātre 'pa ānīyodagagrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāṃ trirutpunāti /
GV06apastgcu:653: atra prakṛtayorapi pavitrayoḥ punargrahaṇāt pāṇyoḥ prāgagratvamācārasiddhaṃ 'āṅguṣṭhopakaniśṭhikābhyāmuttānābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām'(āśva.gṛ.1-3-3.)
GV06apastgcu:655: tatastā apassamaṃ prāṇairhṛtvā prāmasthānabhyāṃ mukanāsikābhyāṃ samamudūdhṛtya uttareṇāgniṃ punastīrṇeṣu darbheṣu sādayati,
GV06apastgcu:669: tramuttarāsaṅgaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ vā tatra kṛtvādhānyat kuryā (khā0sū01-1-26.)
GV06apastgcu:682: pitṛbhūtartvikpakṣe 'pi yaḥ piturbrahmā sa evātra niṣādyata iti niyamo nāsti //
GV06apastgcu:683: anye tu-śraute brahmā dakṣiṇenāgniṃ darbeṣu niviṣṭo dṛṣṭa- /
GV06apastgcu:684: tatheva bahvṛcānāṃ chandogānāṃ ca gṛhye brahmetyeva coditaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:689: na ca dakṣiṇato niṣaditasya brāhmamamātrasya brahmatvaṃ sūtrakārasyeṣṭam /

GV06apastgcu:696: ityatrānuktānāṃ mantrādīnāṃ parisaṃkhyeyaṃ ceti vadatāṃ coktirītyā svārtaparatve sambhavati doṣatrayayuktaparisaṃkhyāśrayaṇaṃ nirhetukam //21//
GV06apastgcu:698_1: teṣvadhiśritya jvalatāvadyutya dve darbhāgre pratyasya triḥ paryagni kṛtvodagudvāsyāṅgārān
GV06apastgcu:698_2: pratyūhyodagagrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāṃ punarāhāraṃ trirutpūya paritre anuprahṛtya // ĀpGs_1.22 //
GV06apastgcu:701: athājyasaṃskāra- tatra vilāpanamājyasya yasminkasmiṃścidagnau bhavati uttaratrājyagrahaṇāt /
GV06apastgcu:703: punarājyagrahaṇamanāghāre 'pi karmaṇi saṃskāraḥ ājyasya yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:709: tatra dve darbhāgre pavitravatsaṃskṛtyājye pratyasyati prakṣipati /
GV06apastgcu:710: dve grahaṇamekaṃ ve tyasyāgnihotradṛṣṭasya vikalpasya pratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:711: tenāgnihotrike 'pi tantre dve eva darbhāgre bhavataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:712: tatastadājyaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ paryagni karoti ājyasya sarvato 'gniṃ trirāvartayati tṛṇenolmukena vā /
GV06apastgcu:727: 'ājyaṃ vilāpya'iti prakṛte 'pi punarājyagrahaṇamājyasyaiva nirvāpādayaḥ na punaḥ 'dadhna evāñjalinā juhoti“(āpa.gṛ.22-10)
GV06apastgcu:737: dve darbhāgre aniyatāyāme tṛṇādyantardhāya chitvādbhissaṃspṛśya te yugapadājye prakṣipet 'dve'ityadhikaśabdāt, ācārācca /
GV06apastgcu:738: atholmukamādāyājye pradakṣiṇaṃ triḥ paryagni kṛtvā samantato 'gnimāvartya tadudagavatārayet /
GV06apastgcu:740: iti siddhasya punarvidhānametayornityamudagevāpavargaḥ na tu daive vikalpenāpi prāgapavargaḥ,

GV06apastgcu:2308: śibikāmāndolikāṃ rathaṃ manuṣyaṃ vāpra vā hārayet /
GV06apastgcu:2314: nāvaśyaṃ ktvāpratyayayuktaṃ vacanaṃ pūrvakālatāṃ samānakartṛkatāṃ vā vidadhāti /
GV06apastgcu:2319: tathātrāpi 'pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvottrābhyāṃ yoktraṃ vimucya'iti pramītāmokṣaṇādermadhye kartavyatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:2320: tathā dadhigharme 'etasmin kāle śrātaṃ haviriti pratyuktvā tamādāyāhavanīyaṃ gatvā'(āpa.śrau.13-3-4) iti /
GV06apastgcu:2323: tathaivānyatrāpyaśvamedhe 'dakṣiṇāpaplāvyāhaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahanniti brahma yajamānasya hastaṃ gṛhṇāti'(āpa.śrau.) iti /
GV06apastgcu:2324: tathaivātra 'smṛtaṃ ca ma ityetadvācayitvā gurave varaṃ datvodāyuṣetyutthāpya'(āpa.gṛ.11-17) iti //13//
GV06apastgcu:2329: etaṃ vaivāhikamagnimukhāyāṃ samopya dampatyorgacchatoranu pṛṣṭhataḥharantitadīyāḥ puraṣāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2331: evaṃ pratiṣedaṃ kurvannetaddarśayati anugato manthya ityatra śrautavadavakṣāṇebhyo manthanamiti /
GV06apastgcu:2335: etaṃ vivāhāgniṃ samopyokhāyāmanuharanti avyavāyena vadhvāḥ paścānnayanti parikarmiṇaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2336: etamitigrahaṇaṃ vivāhāgneraupāsanākhyasya saṃskāraśabdābhivyaṅgyasya prayāṇe 'pi nityaṃ pratyakṣanayanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2337: agṛhyamāṇe tvetamityāsmin adṛṣṭārtha sarvārthasya laukikākāgneranuharaṇaṃ syāt /
GV06apastgcu:2338: aupāsanasya ca gṛhyāntareṇa prayāṇe vihitaṃ samāropaṇaṃ syāt //14//
GV06apastgcu:2351: ataḥ sāṅge vivāhe samāpte 'pi 'apavṛtte karmaṇi laukikassampadyate'; (āpa.pa.4-22)
GV06apastgcu:2353: nitya iti siddhe dhārya ityārambhāt prayāṇe 'pyasya samidhyātmanyarapyorvā samāropaṇaṃ gṛhyāntaravihitaṃ vikalpenāpi na syāt /
GV06apastgcu:2364: evaṃ vidheṣu yadyapi yājñikā vikalpaṃ neccanti,
GV06apastgcu:2366: 'savarṇāpūrvaśāstravihitāyāṃ yatartu gacchataḥ putrāsteṣāṃ karmabhissambandhaḥ''dāyenāvyatikramaścobhayoḥ''pūrvavatyāmasaṃskṛtāyāṃ varṇāntare ca maithune doṣaḥ'(āpa.gha.2-13-1,2,3)
GV06apastgcu:2367: ityasavarṇadārasaṅgrahaṇaṃ pratiṣidhya svayamevāha sūtrakāraḥ- sa trayāṇāṃ varṇānām'(āpa.pa.1-2) iti /
GV06apastgcu:2368: trayāṇāmityetasya padasyārtho bhāṣyakāreṇa vyākhyātaḥ-'tisro hi tasya bhāryāssmṛtyantaravacanādapratiṣiddhāḥ,
GV06apastgcu:2392: śrutavṛttādhyayanasampanno brāhmaṇaḥśrotriyaḥtasya gṛhe yaḥ pacanāgniḥ tasmādvāhāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2408: agnāvanugate bhāryāyāḥ patyuśca ubhayorupavāso bhavati tayoranyatarasya veti /
GV06apastgcu:2416: nanvanugato manthya iti prakṛtaṃ tatkimanugata iti nimittanirdeśena ?
GV06apastgcu:2421: tathā ca 'trirātramubhayoradhaśśayyā barahmacarya'mityādīnāṃ prāsaṅgikena saṃbandho na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2423: anugate ubhayorupavāso 'nyatarasya vetyeva siddhe bhāryāyāḥ patyuśceti pṛthaṅnirdeśaḥ kathamasyāgneratyantaṃ bhāryāsaṃbandhaḥ pratijñāpitasyāditi /
GV06apastgcu:2424: ata eva bhāryāyāḥ pūrvavirdeśaḥ tena yasmin karmaṇi bhāryāyāssahatvaṃ nāsti yathopākaraṇasamāpanayostasyaitasminnagnāvapravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2428: anyatarasya kālasya ahno vā rātrercā sambandhī upavāsaḥ anaśanaṃ bhāryāyāḥ patyurvā bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2430: yadyahani rātrau vā prāgbhojanādanugatistadā mathitvā'hṛtya vā 'yatrakvace'ti vidhinepasamādhāya 'yadyavijñātā sarvavyāpadvā'; iti
GV06apastgcu:2433: sarvatā tu vijñātamātra evānugamane utpādanādi kāryam,
GV06apastgcu:2442: kecit -'upavāsaścānyatarasya bhāryāyāḥ patyurvānugate'iti sūtraṃ chitvā vyavahitānvayakalpanayā vyācakṣate- anugato 'gnau bāryāyāḥ patyuścopavāso 'nyatarasya veti /
GV06apastgcu:2443: atra prakṛte 'pi punaranugata iti grahaṇamadhikayatnamantareṇaivaṃvidhānāṃ prāsaṅgikārthatā na syāt,
GV06apastgcu:2451: api veti vacanādeva vaikalpikatve siddhe upavāsapratiṣedha iyamāhutirupa vāsasyaiva pratyāmnāyā yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:2454: asyaivāgnerbuddhipūrvotsarge dvādaśāhādūrdhva vicchede ca smṛtyantare prāyaścittamuktam /
GV06apastgcu:2458: api vā agnāvanugate uttarayā'ayāścāgne'ityetayā'jyaṃ juhuyānnopa vaset /
GV06apastgcu:2490: uttarābhyāṃ 'yuñjanti bradhnaṃ''yoge yoge'iti dvābhyāṃ aśvāvanaḍvāhau vā yugadhurorābadhnāti /
GV06apastgcu:2494: atra ca uttarābhyāmiti dvandvāpavādenaikaśeṣeṇa samabhivyāhṛtayojanakriyāpekṣayetaretarayogābhihitayordvayorapi mantrayossahitayorviniyogāt 'ekamantrāṇi karmāṇi'(āpa.pa.1-41)
GV06apastgcu:2504: iha bahuvacananirdeśāt triprabhṛti aniyamaprasaṅge mantraliṅgāccatasṛbhiriti niyamaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2519: sūtre vartmanorvyavastṛṇāttyuttarayā nīlaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ lohitamuttarasyām // ĀpGs_5.24 //
GV06apastgcu:2531: sūtre yugapat gṛhītvā sakṛdeva mantrumaktavā vyavastṛṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:2534: abhiyānaṃ tu sānnāyyakumbhīvat draṣṭavyam-aprasresāya yajñasyo 'khe upadadhāmyaha miti /
GV06apastgcu:2540: rathasya bhāvinyorrvatanyoḥ nīlalohite bhavataḥ utyetayā dve sūtre vyavastṛṇātitiryakstṛṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:2557: ye vadhvaścandram iti tisṛbhirvyavastīrṇe sūtre abhiyātiuparigacchati // 25 //
GV06apastgcu:2571: tenaikātikramaṇe itarayoḥ śravaṇaṃ vyartha syāditi na codanīyaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:2598: nyāyatastu japamantro nārthaparaḥ ato nātra tīrthādayo 'śvinau vā tātparyeṇābhidhīyante /
GV06apastgcu:2600: eṣa eva nyāyo nadīnāṃ dhanvanāṃ ca vyatikrame //26//
GV06apastgcu:2606: atha yadi pathi nāvā tāryā nadī vāpī vā syāt tatranāvamuttarayarcā 'ayaṃ no mahyāḥ pāraṃ svastī'tyetayānumantrayate
GV06apastgcu:2612: yadi pathi nadī nāvā taritavyā syāt,
GV06apastgcu:2613: tadā varaḥ 'ayaṃ no mahyāḥ pāram'ityetayā nāvamanumantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:2615: na ca nāvyāṃ staratī vadhūḥ paśyet // ĀpGs_6.2 //
GV06apastgcu:2619: nāvi bhavā nāvyāḥ kaivartāḥ tāntaratī tarantī taraṇakāla ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2620: strīliṅganirdeśādeva siddhe vadhūgrahaṇaṃ darśanapratiṣedho vadhvā eva yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:2625: kecit nāvā tār#a āpo nāvyā iti vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:2641: yadi nadī na bhavati tadā yā oṣadhaya ityetāmapi japet /
GV06apastgcu:2645: pāraṃ prāpya 'asya pāre'ityetāṃ vara eva japet //3//
GV06apastgcu:2647: śmaśānādhivyātikrame bhāṇḍe rathe vā riṣṭe 'gnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte 'nvārabdhāyāmuttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate pariṣecanāntaṃ karoti // ĀpGs_6.4 //
GV06apastgcu:2650: śmaśānabhūmeradhyupari vyatikrame bhāṇḍe bhājanādau rathe riṣṭe naṣṭe ratha iti pradarśanamanyeṣu caivaṃprakāreṣu darnimitteṣu vakṣyamāṇahomaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2664: yadidamagnerupasamādhānādi pariṣecanāntaṃ karma tadanantaraṃ naimittikamuktaṃ tat karoti /
GV06apastgcu:2666: anantaroktānāṃ nimittānāṃ deśakālabhedenāvṛttāvapi sakṛdovānte 'yaṃ homo bhavatītyarthaḥ //6//
GV06apastgcu:2677: kṣīriṇāmanyeṣāṃ vā lakṣmaṇyānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ dhanvanāṃ ca vyatikrama uttare yathāliṅgaṃ japet // ĀpGs_6.5 //
GV06apastgcu:2684: dhanvanāṃ nirjalānāmaraṇyānāñca vyatikrame uttareṛcau yathāliṅga yasya liṅga yasyāṃ dṛśyate tadvyatikrame tāṃ japet /
GV06apastgcu:2693: kṣīriṇaḥkṣīravantaḥ plakṣanyagrodhādayaḥ lakṣma cihnaṃ tatra bhavāḥlakṣmaṇyāḥdurgā tintriṇikā sīmākadambā ityevamādayaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2694: nadyaḥ prasiddhāḥdhanvānodīrghāṇyaraṇyāni yeṣu grāmyāḥ paśavo na nivasanti /
GV06apastgcu:2705: atha svaṃ gṛhaṃ prāpya rathādavaropya yaddhanaṃ tasyā vahatutvenāgataṃ tacca gṛhān prapādya tatastayā tānsaṅkāśayatisamyagīkṣayati
GV06apastgcu:2708: saṅkāśayāmi darśayāmi vahatuṃ vadhvāḥ pitṛkulādānītaṃ dhanaṃ brahmāṇā maitreṇa aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā na kevalamaghoreṇa,
GV06apastgcu:2709: kiṃ tarhi maitreṇa gṛhairmadīyaissārdha gṛhaṃ ca madīyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2710: asyāṃ paryāṇaddhaṃ viśvarūpākhyaṃ yadābharaṇaṃ tatparibhyaḥ ekasmin bahuvacanam /
GV06apastgcu:2731: lohitaṃ carmā'naḍuhaṃ prācīnagrīvamuttaraloma madhye 'gārasyottarayā'stīrya gṛhān prapādayannuttarāṃ vācayati dakṣiṇena padā // ĀpGs_6.8 //
GV06apastgcu:2734: vimucya vāhau varaḥ pūrva gṛhaṃ svayaṃ praviśya yatra dampatyorvāsaḥ tatrāgārasya madhye camīstṛṇāti uttarayarcā 'śarmā varme'tyetayā taccānaḍuhaṃ bhavati lohitañca varṇena /
GV06apastgcu:2738: prapādayaṃstāmuttarāmṛcaṃvācayati 'gṛhāni'ti prakṛte punargṛhānityucyate- hatarathā agārasyāpi prakṛtatvāt praveśane mantraḥ śaṃkyeta /
GV06apastgcu:2744: tato varaḥ pūrva svagṛhān praviśya 'śarma varma'ityetayā yathāsūtraṃ carmāstīrya tato vadhūṃdakṣiṇena padāgṛhānprapādayanpraveśayan';
GV06apastgcu:2752: tāṃ prapādanakāle svayaṃ sā ca nātikrāmoditayarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2754: prapadya gṛhān atha tatkālamaśanamaśnīyāt tato yasminnagāre carmātipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:2761_1: jayādi pratipadyate pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvottarayā carmaṇyupaviśata uttaro varaḥ // ĀpGs_6.10 //
GV06apastgcu:2764: uttarāstrayodaśapradhānāhutīḥ 'āgangoṣṭha'mityādyāḥ liṅgavirodhe satyapi vara eva juhoti,
GV06apastgcu:2768: uttaro vara ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ sarveṣu homeṣu bhavatītyuktam /
GV06apastgcu:2784: athāsyāḥ puṃsvorjīvaputrāyāḥ putramaṅka uttarayopaveśya tasmai phalānyuttareṇa yajuṣā pradāyottare japitvā vācaṃ yacchata (ti)
GV06apastgcu:2788: ya pumāṃsameva sūte na striyaṃ sā puṃśūḥ'tasyāḥ puṃsvo jīvaputrāyā iti pāṭhaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2791: jīvā eva putrā yasyā na bhṛtāḥ jīvaputrāyāḥ jīvapatyā iti ca draṣṭavyam /
GV06apastgcu:2793_1: aṅka upaveśya tasmai kumārāya phalānyuttareṇa yajuṣā 'prasvasthaḥ preya'mityanena
GV06apastgcu:2794: 'iha priyaṃ''simaṅgalīḥ'ityete japitvā tata ubhau tasminneva carmaṇyāsīnau vācaṃ yacchataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2799: puṃsvoḥ puṃsvāḥ ityarcapāṭhaḥ yā puṃsa eva sūte na strīrapi,
GV06apastgcu:2800: yā ca sūta eva na tu vandhyā satī krayādinā putravatī, sā puṃsūḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2801: jīvanta eva putrāḥ pumāṃso yasyāssā jīvaputrā,
GV06apastgcu:2806: evaṃ bhūtāyāḥ putraṃ 'somenādityāḥ'ityetayā vadhvā aṅka upaveśya 'pra svasthaḥ'iti yajuṣā putrāya phalāni kadalyādīni pradāya 'iha priyaṃ prajayā'iti ṛcau japitvā,
GV06apastgcu:2810: uditeṣu nakṣatreṣu prācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramyottarābhyāṃ yathāliṅgaṃ dhruvamarundhatīṃ ca darśayati // ĀpGs_6.12 //
GV06apastgcu:2813: uditeṣu nakṣatreṣviti vacanāttataḥ prākū tasminneva carmaṇi vāgyatayorāsanaṃ paścādupaniṣkramaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:2817: varastu paśyan dhruvamiti nirdirśya pūrvā vācayati vascādarundhatīmittyuttarām /
GV06apastgcu:2818: tato vāgvisargaḥ mantraliṅgādeva yathāliṅgadarśane siddhe yathāliṅgavacanaṃ vikalpārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2820: tenottarasyāmṛci sarveṣāṃ saptarṣīṇāṃ kṛttikādināmarūndhatyāśca sahadarśanaṃ vadhvāḥ karma pakṣe bhavati,
GV06apastgcu:2824: uttarābhyāṃ 'dhruvakṣitirdhruvayoniḥ'ityetābhyāṃ yathāliṅgaṃ pūrvayā sapraṛṣayā dhruvamuttarayārundhatīṃ ca darśayati vadhūm /
GV06apastgcu:2825: yathāliṅgamiti ca jātakarmavaddvābhyāṃ dvābhyāmekaikaṃ mā bhūditi //
GV06apastgcu:2829: yathāliṅgaṃ vā iti bhitvā sūtraṃ sādhyāhāraṃ vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:2830: 'sapraṛṣayaḥ prathamām'ityetayā saptaṛṣīn kṛttikā arundhatīṃ ca saha darśayati /
GV06apastgcu:2850: tataśca sa eva yadi devatāvidhiḥ syāt dvidevatyamidaṃ haviḥ syāt /
GV06apastgcu:2852: yadyapi vastuto giṇabhūtaḥ sviṣṭakṛdyāgaḥ tathāpi pradhānavat tatra codyate-'agnisviṣṭakṛdvitīya'iti /
GV06apastgcu:2861: tena yadidaṃ sthālīpākariveṣaṇaṃ brīhyādidakṣiṇā ca tat vadhūdhanasyaiva bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2872: tena loke vyutpattisiddhādhyāhārādibhirapi yassūtrasyārthassampādyate so 'pi vedārthonuṣṭheya ucyate-dhruvamarundhatīṃ ca darśayitvā,
GV06apastgcu:2873: anantaraṃ yatrāgneyena sthālīpākena yāgaṃ karoti tatraivaināṃ patnīṃ yājayati patnyāmanvārabdhāyāṃ juhoti,
GV06apastgcu:2883: tenāgneya eva saṅkalpitasya vrīhyāderarthākṣipto laukiko nirvāpaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2895: arundhatīdarśanānantaramagāraṃ praviśya vrīhīn yavān vā navānagnaye saṃkalpitān nirvapati yāvaddhomāya brahmaṇabhojanāya ca paryāptaṃ manyate /
GV06apastgcu:2898: 'enā patyā'ityādivat sāvahantīti sarvanāmnā nirdeśe kartavye patnīgrahaṇaṃ patnīkarmedaṃ yathā vijñāyeta /
GV06apastgcu:2900: vadhūriha yajamāneti kṛtvā pārvaṇādiṣu patyuravahananaṃ prāpnoti //2//
GV06apastgcu:2909: yajamānakarmatve hi sahādhikāre pārvaṇādau patyuravahananaṃ syāt,
GV06apastgcu:2920: agrerupasamādhānādivacanaṃ tantravidhānārtha kālavidhānārtha ca pratiṣṭhatābhighāraṇānte kathaṃ tantraṃ pratipadyeta, na prāgiti /
GV06apastgcu:2932: evaṃ tarhi śailīyamācāryasya-yatrobhayaṃ havirbhavatyājya ñcauṣadhayaśca tatra pradhānāhutiviśeṣaṇaṃ karoti sthālīpākādannādapūpādājyāhutiruti /
GV06apastgcu:2933: tena yatra viśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti tatraikameva haviriti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2938: vivāhe ca 'yathā sthānamupaviśye'tyatra ājyāhutiriti viśeṣaṇābhāvādājyameva tatra dharmavaddhāviḥ,
GV06apastgcu:2962: homadarvyā sruveṇa darvyantareṇa vā sakṛdupastaraṇaṃ kāryam /
GV06apastgcu:2974: agnireva devatā pūrvasya homasya yeyamāgneyeneti vihitā /
GV06apastgcu:2982: ityeva siddhe vacanamidaṃ kalpāntareṣu keṣucit mantreṇa pradānañcodita“mamuṣmai svāheti juhuyāt,
GV06apastgcu:2983: ṛcā vā taddevataye“ti 'puronuvākyāmanūcya yājyayā juhuyā'diti ca tatpratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2984: evamapi 'sthālīpākājjuhotyagnaye svāhetyeva vaktavyaṃ'sviṣṭakṛti ca sviṣṭakṛte svāheti /
GV06apastgcu:2985: idaṃ tu vacanaṃ pārvaṇātidiṣṭeṣu yathopadeśaṃ devatā ityatra mantrapratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2987: ityevamādiṣu yatra sthālīpākasya devataiva codyate tatra devatāśabdenaiva homaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:2995: nanva nvārabdhāyāmagnaye juhotī'ti vaktavye kimarthamadhikākṣaraṃ 'agnirdevatā svāhākārapradānaḥ'ityupadiśyateūucyate-śabdo devatā,
GV06apastgcu:3005: atra tu jñātakaṃ 'āgneyā iti tu sthitiḥ'(niru.8-3-7)
GV06apastgcu:3007: kecit- kalpāntareṣu 'amuṣmai svāheti juhuyāt ṛcā vā taddaivatyayā'iti vikalpaḥ coditaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3021: na tu pūrvavaccaturavattaṃ pañcāvattaṃ vā apūrvatvāddarvihomānām //6//
GV06apastgcu:3038: tathā ca sati 'yathopadeśaṃ pradhānāhutīḥ'ityatra sviṣṭakṛtamapi hutvā jayādītyevamādi bhavediti // 7 //
GV06apastgcu:3061: nanu tatrāpi“pūrvār dhādvitīyaṃ paścārdhāt tṛtīya“mityetayordeśaviśeṣayoḥ pratiṣedhārtha syāt /
GV06apastgcu:3072: ityavadānasthānasiddheḥ etenopaghātapakṣe catiravattadharma upastaraṇādirna pravartate iti darśayati //9//
GV06apastgcu:3077: atrāpi paugoḍāśika eva homadeśo darśito vijñeyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3101: homagrahaṇe āśriyamāṇe uttarārdhapūrvārdha ityasya lepayoḥ prastaravadittyuttareṇāpi sambandhassambhāvyeta //14//
GV06apastgcu:3108: homopastaraṇādyarthadarvīdvapalepayoḥ pātraprayogārtha saṃstīrṇasya ca varhiṣaḥ pratipattimāha--
GV06apastgcu:3113: yasmin barhiṣi pratiṣṭhitaṃ havirājyaṃ ca tasmāt kiñcidupādāya tadvarhirannasya cājyasya ca yau lepau tayoḥ prastarava ttūṣṇīmaṅtvā
GV06apastgcu:3115: ata eva pratipattividhānādapareṇāgniṃ barhiṣaḥ staraṇaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3124: upaghātapakṣe tūpastaraṇāṃbhighāraṇārthāyā darvyā abhāvādājyasthālyāṃ madhyasya mūlasya carusthālyām /
GV06apastgcu:3126: tathā yayā homastasyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca āgnīdhrakarma ca svayameva karoti //15//
GV06apastgcu:3129: lepayoḥdarvīdvayalagnayoḥ pātrāsādanārtha saṃstīrṇabarhiḥprastaravattūṣṇī maṅktvā tadvadevāgnau praharati /
GV06apastgcu:3140: anye tu ājyasthālīṃ dhruvāsthāne pakṣatraye 'pi kurvanti,
GV06apastgcu:3146: kecit-kalpāntarādapareṇāgniṃ yasmin barhiṣi havirājyaṃ ca pratiṣṭhitaṃ tasmādvā,
GV06apastgcu:3148: tanna; kalpāntaroktabarhiḥ pratiṣṭhāpanopasaṃhārasya pākṣikatvena nityadvaddhakramamapi pariṣecanaṃ na nivartate,
GV06apastgcu:3160: anye tu siddhamuttaraṃ pariṣecanamitye kameva yogaṃ paṭhanto vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:3161: teneha sthālīpāke pradhānahomānantaraṃ tantraśeṣasya prāptasya parṣecanameva siddhamanyadasiddhamiti /
GV06apastgcu:3187: yo dakṣiṇata āste sa iha brāhmaṇaḥ taṃ bhojayet vadhūrvaro vā //18//
GV06apastgcu:3202: svakulādānīyartvije varāya dātavyā satī dakṣiṇā jāyāpatyoḥ anyonyadānapratigrahābhāvāt tadācāryāya codyate /
GV06apastgcu:3204: dṛśyate cāyaṃ nyāyo dharmaśāstre-“na pitā yājayet putraṃ na putraḥ pitṛyājanam“ityādyuktvā ''cāryāya dakṣiṇāṃ dadyurutu //19//
GV06apastgcu:3212: tathāpi tasyā bharturapi pravāse sahādhikāreṣu karmasu madhyaga dhanatyāge 'numatidvāreṇāva kartṛtvābhyupagamāt /
GV06apastgcu:3215: tena ca ṛtvigbhūto vara ānato bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3220: atha ubhayādhikāravivāhasidhyarthameva vadhūranena pradhānakarmaṇāpi yāgena saṃskriyate,
GV06apastgcu:3222: tasmāt śūtraṃ yathopapannaṃ syāt tathā vyākhyeyam /
GV06apastgcu:3225: atrocyate-evaṃ tarhyadhyāhāreṇa vā vipariṇāmena vā vyākhyāyate /
GV06apastgcu:3227: yadvā ye 'sya śthālīpākayāgasya karturapacitastasmā etadyāgakartā ṛṣabhaṃ dadāti,
GV06apastgcu:3231: yo 'yaṃ loke vidyābhijanādisampattyā apacitaḥ tasmā ayametatsthālīpākakartā ṛṣabhaṃ dadāti /
GV06apastgcu:3234: evamata ūrdhva dakṣiṇāvarjamupoṣitābhyāṃ parvasu kāryaḥ // ĀpGs_7.17 //
GV06apastgcu:3238: ityanena prakāreṇa kṛtopavāsābhyāṃ gṛhamedhibhyāṃparvasu paurṇamāsīṣu cāmāvāsyāsu ca evamevāgneyasthālīpākakalpena sthālīpākaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3240: tasya ca“āgneyena sthālīpākena yājayatī“tyevamādiḥ tasmā ṛṣabhaṃ dadātī'tyevamanātaḥ kalpa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3243: tatra pārvaṇe vivāhanimittā viśeṣāḥ sakṛtpātrāṇi śamyā ityādayo na kartavyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3254: tena saṃveśanānte vivāhikarmaṇi niṣṭhite pañcamahāyajñādīnāṃ gṛhasthadharmāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3261: chandogāścāmananti -amāvāsyā cet pūrvamāpadyate paurṇamāseneṣṭvātha tat kuryāt /
GV06apastgcu:3266: tasmāt parvasu cobhayorupavāsa iti prāptamupavāsaṃ prakṛtyaṃśenānūdya dvivacanena dvayoradhikāraḥ pradarśyate -upoṣitābhyāmiti /
GV06apastgcu:3273: ubhābhyāṃ parvasu kārya ityucyamāne parvasveva sthālīpākassyāt,
GV06apastgcu:3279: ityādividhinā kṛtopavāsābhyāṃ jāyāpatibhyāṃ parvasu paurṇamāsīṣvamāvāsyāsu ca dvitīyāsudakṣiṇāvarja ṛṣabhadānavarjaevamevaṃprakāra etatsthālīpākasadṛśo homaḥ kartavya iti vidhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3299: iti nyāyena prakṛtasyaiva sthālīpākasya 'evaṃ parvasu kāryaḥ';
GV06apastgcu:3301: etadapi na;evaṃ sati 'eṣa kārya'iti sūtraṃ syāt,
GV06apastgcu:3305: dharmātideśe tu yathā nānvārambhastathoktameva 'athaināmāgneyema'iti sūtramatideśaviśeṣārthamiti vadatā bhāṣyakāreṇa /
GV06apastgcu:3306: atra ca 'ata ūrdhvam'iti vacanaṃ vivāhamadhye 'pi parvārambhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:3335: iti vacanāt dhānyamuṣṭīnāṃ aṣṭāviṃśatyādhikaṃ śataṃ pūrṇapātram /
GV06apastgcu:3340: sāyaṃ prātarata ūrdhva hastenaite āhutī taṇḍulairyavairvā juhuyāt // ĀpGs_7.19 //
GV06apastgcu:3343: asmāt sthālīpākādūrdhva yāśca eto āhutī brīhitaṇḍulairyavairvājuhuyāt /
GV06apastgcu:3347: ete āhutī ityucyate- ye agnihotrāhutī āhitāgneste ete iti pratijñāpanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:3366: asya cārabbho 'nantaraṃ rātrāveva yadi nava nāḍyo nātītāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3373: 'ete'iti viśeṣaṇādatrāpi dvitīyāhutiḥ sviṣṭakṛtsthānītyā aṅgamityarthaḥ tenetāṃ vismṛtya karmasamāptau neṣā punarhotavyā /
GV06apastgcu:3412: ityatra ca sarvaśabedona prakṛtaparāmarśinā prakṛtaśrautasarvayajñānāmeva parāmarśāt /
GV06apastgcu:3423: yo 'yaṃ pārvaṇasya kalpaḥ 'evamata ūrdhva'ityādiḥ pūrṇapātrastu dakṣiṇetyeka ityevamantaḥ sa eva sarveṣāṃ pākayajñānāṃ kalpa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3426: nanvismin vaivāhke dharmā āmnātāḥ pārvaṇasyāpi tata evātidiṣṭāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3430: tena pakvaguṇeṣveva sthālīpākeṣu paśuṣu cāyamatideśo nājyaguṇakeṣu /
GV06apastgcu:3440: ācārādyāni gṛhyanta iti vacanāt asmin śāstre a'nupadiṣṭānāmapi śāstrāntaradṛṣṭānāṃ pakvaguṇakānāmayamupadeśo bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3450: iti pārvaṇaśabdādaṇpratyaye kṛte pārvama ityevaṃ rūpaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3455: nanvevamapi śīghrāvagatasya nityasya pārvaṇasya prakṛtitye sambhavati kimiti vilambitāvagamyasya vaivāhikasya prakṛtitvamucyate ?
GV06apastgcu:3461: asya ca vaivāhikasya pārvaṇaśabdāvācyatvaṃ dharmasāstre vyaktameva /
GV06apastgcu:3473: nanvatra kecit- 'yaccainayoḥ priyaṃ syāttadetasminnahami'ityetacchabdenaikavacanāntena 'parsu ca'iti bahivacanāntanirdiṣṭaparvāhaḥ parāmarśānupapatteḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3478: tasya ca ka4māntarasyopacāraḥ pārvaṇena nityena vyākhyāta ityāhuḥ tatkathaṃ dharmaśāstre vyaketaṃ vaivāhikasya pārvaṇaśabdavācyatvamiti /
GV06apastgcu:3482: gamyamānaṃ caitacchabdena parāmraṣṭuṃ priyabhojanādinā viśeṣayituṃ ca nārham /
GV06apastgcu:3487: ataścātra 'parvasu ca'ityuddeśyagatabahutvasyāvivakṣitatvāt śrutāvyavahitasya prakṛtasyaparvāhasyaiva parāmarśo viśeṣaṇaṃ ca yuktam /
GV06apastgcu:3491: anuvāde ca tasyopacāra iti dūrasyasya parāmarśo ghaṭate /
GV06apastgcu:3494: tathāpi yasyeme vidhīyamānā upavāsapriyabhojanādayo dharmāssambandhinastasyopacāraḥ pārvamena vyākhyāta iti sādhyāhāramevedaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyeyam /
GV06apastgcu:3501: atra ca ato 'nyānītyāha-etatsadṛśānyevauṣadhapradhānahavīṃṣi sarpabalyādīni karmāṇyanena vyākhyātāni,
GV06apastgcu:3502: na tvanena tatsadṛśāni paśuprabhavapradhānahavīṃṣi vapāhomādīnīti vaktum /
GV06apastgcu:3509: auṣadhāni havīmaṣi paśuprabhavāni ca kāni katidhā ca ?iti
GV06apastgcu:3532: .iti prakṛte 'pyatra punarvacanaṃ gṛhyapraśne 'nuktānāṃ mahārājasthālīpāka gaṇahomādīnāmetadvikṛtitvaṃ vaktapam /
GV06apastgcu:3536: ucyate-yadyapi śrautaāprayaṇe vaiśvadevādīnāṃ bhūyastvena paurṇamāsatantrāśaṅkāyāṃ aindrāgnasya mukhyatvāt 'mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāllokavat'(jai.sū.12-2-23)
GV06apastgcu:3539: tathāpyatrānyeṣāṃ haviṣāṃ bahutve 'pyauṣadhasya mukhyatvāt pārvaṇatantrataiveti mukhyanyāyaṃ mandabuddhihitārtha darśayitumeva punaścoktaṃ 'pārvaṇavadājyabhāgānte'iti /
GV06apastgcu:3540: tena māsiśrāddhe aṣṭakākarmaṇi ca pārvaṇameva tantram /
GV06apastgcu:3545: iti punarvacanamapūpamāṃsaudanapiṣṭānnahomānāṃ sthāne anukalpena vihitasyauṣadhahaviṣkasyāpi dadhihomasya pārvaṇatantraprāptiṃ jñāpayitum,
GV06apastgcu:3549: yathā 'yasya haviṣevatsā apākṛtā dhayeyustatsthāne vāyavyāṃ yavāgūṃ nirvapet'(āpa.śrau.9-1-23)
GV06apastgcu:3551: kecit-nityasya pārvaṇasya yaḥ kalpassa eva sarveṣāṃ yajñānāṃ kalpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3554: ato 'nyānīti vacanādetatsadṛśānāṃ pakvaguṇānāmeva sthālīpākānāṃ paśūnāṃ cāyaṃ vikalpo,
GV06apastgcu:3559: ityatra paśau na patnīvattvam nāpi hṛdayasaṃsargādiṣu parvaṇo niyamaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3564: etadgṛhyopadiṣṭeṣu yatra vacanaṃ tatraiva tantraṃ, nānyatra /
GV06apastgcu:3566: yata upadiṣṭadharmakasya vaivāhikasya dharmātideśe 'pi naiva doṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3579: tathā naikasminnāgrayaṇe tantralopaphalārtha niyamārthāni bahūni sūtrāṇyārabdhavyāni /
GV06apastgcu:3589: tena pārvaṇe ye devate yasca sthālīpākaḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣu karmasu pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3590: tatra tatrepadiṣṭābhistu devatābhiḥ pārvaṇadevatayoḥ bādhe prāpte tannivṛttyartha vacanaṃ tatra coditānāṃ devatānāṃ deśavidhānārthañca-yo 'yamagniḥ pārvaṇoyaśca sviṣṭakṛt,
GV06apastgcu:3591: tāvantareṇa tayormadhye tā devatā yaṣṭavyā iti /
GV06apastgcu:3592: tatra pārvaṇasyāgneḥ pārvaṇameva haviḥ tatra tatra vihitānāṃ tatra tatra vihitam /
GV06apastgcu:3595: anye tu tatra vihitādeva haviṣaḥ pārvaṇadevatayorapījyāmicchanti /
GV06apastgcu:3596: apara īha- nātra pārdevate anūrdyate agniśca sviṣṭakṛcca /
GV06apastgcu:3597: kiṃ tarhi ?āgantuke ete anenaiva vacanena vidhīyete /
GV06apastgcu:3602: tathā ca śrauteṣu 'yena yajñenetrset kuryādeva tatrāgneyamiti /
GV06apastgcu:3604: pārvaṇavyākhyāteṣu sarveṣveva karmasu yathopadeśaṃ devatā yajati agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca yajati yoyamagnisviṣṭakṛt pārvaṇe dvitīyo devatāviśeṣaḥ taṃ ca yajati tasmādeva haviṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3607: asati samuccaye teṣu tasya pravṛttirna syāt /
GV06apastgcu:3610: antareṇa ityanena tu tasyaiva sviṣṭakṛto deśo niyamyate-pradhānāhutīṣṭopahomāṃścāntaraṇogniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajatīti /
GV06apastgcu:3612: 'ājyāhutīruttarāḥ jayādu pratipadyata'iti ca kramaparaṃ vacanaṃ tatrāpi nityamagnisviṣṭakṛdasminnantarāle yaṣṭavyo bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:3620: yathopadeśaṃ sarpavalyādiṣu yāśca yāvatyaśca yena yena prakāreṇa mantravidhānādinopadṣṭāṃ devatāstā eva bhavanti,
GV06apastgcu:3621: na pārvaṇadevatāḥ na teṣu pārvaṇaṃ pradhānaṃ samuccetavyā ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3625: pārvaṇe ca sthālīpākahomayoḥ prathamo homaḥ pradhānam /
GV06apastgcu:3634: kintu gārhyakarmānuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ madhye ye mandabuddhayo 'ṅgapradhānayoratideśyānatideśyayośca anabhijñāste pārvaṇenetya viśeṣeṇātideśaprātibhāsāt 'ṣaḍibhirdīkṣayati,
GV06apastgcu:3640: yathopadeśaṃ devatāḥ ye vikṛtāvupadiṣṭāḥ te agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ cāntareṇa āgneya sauviṣṭakṛtayorhomayormadhye bhaveyuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3644_0: vibhaktasya sūtrasya cāyaṃ vivakṣitor'thaḥ- sarveṣu tantravatsvauṣadhahomeṣu dadhihomeṣu
GV06apastgcu:3646: sarvatra sviṣṭakṛtaśśeṣapratipattyarthatvāt svata evāsāvante eva bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:3650: tathāgnimiti cobhayebhyaḥ pradhānāhutibhiyaḥ pūrvamevāgnimukhamityevamartha sviṣṭakṛdvanniyama iti //
GV06apastgcu:3651: kecit- 'yathopadeśaṃ devatā agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca'ityevamantamekaṃ sūtram /
GV06apastgcu:3652: tasyārthaḥ- 'agnissviṣṭakṛt dvitīyaḥ'(āpa.gṛ.7-70 ityatra sviṣṭakṛtaḥ pradhānahomatulyadharmatvajñāpanāt vikṛtiṣu ca pārvaṇapradhānalope sati tasyāpi lopassyāt,
GV06apastgcu:3654: agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca kuryāt iti tāsu tasya samuccayo vidhīyate /
GV06apastgcu:3656: prakaraṇādvaikṛtapradhānahomānāṃ jayādīnāṃ ca madhye sarvāsvapi vikṛtiṣu sviṣṭakṛnnitya evetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3661: ityetayoḥ antareṇetyanena sambandhākāṅkṣeṇa ekavākyatve sambhavati vākyabhedasyāyuktatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:3667: svamate sviṣṭakṛtassamuccayavidhānādeva tridoṣāyāḥ parisaṅkhyāyā api nirastatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:3672: yā gauratithaya ālabhyate 'gauriti gāṃ prāheti'tadātithyaṃ nāmakarmatadavikṛtamapūrva pārvaṇadharmāstadvapāhome na kartavyā ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3685: 'kṛtsnavidhānaṃ ca tasyai vapāṃ śrapayitvopastīrṇābhighāritāṃ madhyamekonnātamena vā palāśaparṇenottarayā juhoti'(āpa.gṛ.22-4) iti /
GV06apastgcu:3690: agnau homeṣu ca āgneyasauviṣṭakṛtāvantareṇa ye homāsta eva pradhānāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3696: 'āryāḥ prayatā vaiśvadeva'iti codite vaiśvadevākhye karmaṇi devatopadeśo 'yaṃ nirvāpakāle saṅkalpārtham /
GV06apastgcu:3699: tena viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ iti saṅkalpya gṛhasthena svagṛhe pākaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3700: tathā pakvādevānnāt homā balayaśca tasyai tasyai devatāyai /
GV06apastgcu:3703: tasmāt na pṛthak pañcamahāyajñāḥ kartavyāḥ tatraiva vaiśvadevam yadagnau kriyate sa devayajñaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3707: tatra vaiśvadeve somāya svāheti dvitīyāhutiriti mantravyākhyākāreṇoktam /
GV06apastgcu:3712: ucyate-ihopadeśe tasya kalpasya sarvacaraṇārthatā na syāt, iṣyate ca /
GV06apastgcu:3714: atha taṃhi devatopadeśaḥ tatraiva kasmānna kṛtaḥ ?
GV06apastgcu:3715: ihopadeśaprayojanamasmin gṛhye tadapi vaiśvadevaṃ karmopadiṣṭaṃ yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:3716: tenāsmadīyānāṃ sa eva vaiśvadevakalpo nānyeṣu dharmaśāstreṣu coditaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3724: āgneyādayaṣṣaḍapi homāḥ baliharaṇāni cānagnideśyānyapi sarvāṇyeva pradhānāni;
GV06apastgcu:3728: kintu śeṣa eveti tarhye taccheṣalakṣaṇe tṛtīyādhyāye dṛśyeta /
GV06apastgcu:3731: kintu puṇḍapitṛyajñe tāvadāpastambena hemaḥ piṇḍadānaṃ cobhayaṃ pradhānamuktam,
GV06apastgcu:3753: 'aupāsane pacane vā ṣaḍbhirādyaiḥ pratimantraṃ hastena juhuyāt'(āpa.dha.2-3-17)
GV06apastgcu:3765: sarvaprādhānye ca prayojanam-eṣāmekataramapyakṛtvā prayoge samāpite 'pi tat prāgbhojanāt saprāyaścittaṃ sāṅgamanuṣṭheyam;
GV06apastgcu:3767: kecit-vaiśvadeve viśve devā devatā vidhīyante nirvāpakāle saṅkalpārtham,
GV06apastgcu:3769: yāstu dharmaśāstre mantraviniyogāt kalpitāstāḥ pradānakāle devatāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3772: idaṃ ca vaiśvadevaṃ na pañcamahāyajñebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtam /
GV06apastgcu:3781: tanna, svamate śrutyā coditān viśvān devān vacanaṃ vināpanīya,
GV06apastgcu:3782: tebhyassaṅkalpitasya haviṣo devatāntarebhyo mantravarṇāt kalpitebhyo dātumayuktatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:3786_0: yattu mīḍhuṣyai jayantāya cāsmāt sthālīpākāddānaṃ tadapyabhyudayeṣṭyādivat savanīyapuroḍāśavacca
GV06apastgcu:3787: iti vacanaiḥ sthālīpākāṃśadvaye pūrvadevatāpanayena devatāntara vidhānādyuktam /
GV06apastgcu:3790: naca karmabhede teṣāṃ prayogo durupapāda iti pramitabhedāpahnavo yuktaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3791: yato bhāṣye vaiśvadevasya teṣāṃ ca prayogaḥ pṛthagevopapāditaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:3792: atha prayogabhāṣyamīṣadbhedaṃ sikhyate-vaiśvadevasya karmocyate'prasaṅgāt pañcamahāyajñānāṃ ca /
GV06apastgcu:3795_0: ityādi tatsvāmitvāviśeṣāt sapatnīkaścaritvā praśaste '- hanyārabhya 'āryāḥ prayatā
GV06apastgcu:3797: tato yadi prayāṇe gṛhevā vaiśvadevasya homasya sthāne 'gnirupasamādhātavyaḥ,

GV06apastgcu:4304: tadvāsaḥ śvobhūte parādehi śāvalyamityetābhiścatasṛbhiḥ ṛgbhissūryāvide brāhmaṇāya varo dadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:4313: yadā malavadvāsāḥ syādathaināṃ brāhmaṇapratiṣiddhāni karmāṇi saṃśāsti 'yāṃ malavadvāsasa'(tai.saṃ. 2.5.1)
GV06apastgcu:4326: brāhmaṇapratiṣiddhānītyucyate lokaparatiṣiddhānyupariśayyāsanādīni lokata eva pratyetavyānīti jñāpanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4329: 'etānī'tivacanaṃ 'yāṃ malavadvāsa'samityādīnāṃ pratiṣiddhānāṃ vihitānāṃ ca saṃśāsanaṃ yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:4333: tatra 'yāṃ malavadvāsasa'miti vākye snānāt prāk samāgamapratiṣedhaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4351: malavadvāsāḥkālanirgatena śoṇitena malinaṃ vāso vasanaṃ yasyāssā;
GV06apastgcu:4353: rūḍhaśabdatvādyadṛcchayā nirmalavāsā api yadeyaṃ rajasvalā syāt,
GV06apastgcu:4355: kāni tāni brāhmaṇapratiṣiddhānītyata āha- 'yāṃ malavadvāsasa' mityetāni /
GV06apastgcu:4359: atha tāni sugrahārtha krameṇocyanate-na snānātpūrva maithunam /
GV06apastgcu:4361: tadeva na snātayāpi parāṅmukhyā anicchantyā vā /
GV06apastgcu:4375: atra cāmī maithunādiniṣedhā amaithunādisaṅkalapa vidhayo veti bhāṣye na viviktam /
GV06apastgcu:4401: atra rajasaḥ prādurbhāvāt snātāmitivacanāccaturtha'hani prāyatyārthamanayā snātavyameva //13//
GV06apastgcu:4414: ṛtugamana iti vacanāt vaivāhike prathamagamane satyapi ṛtunimittenāyamupadeśaḥ pravartate /
GV06apastgcu:4417: uttarābhirabhimantrayata iti ca gamanamantrāṇāṃ samuccayo bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4428: uttarāmuttarāṃ yugmāṃrātriṃ prati ṛtugamane ṛtau maithune kṛte,
GV06apastgcu:4431: etaduktaṃ bhavati-trayodaśasu rātriṣu ṛtugamane śuklādhikye sati putrā jāyante /
GV06apastgcu:4432: uttarottarāsu ca yugmāsu yathākramaṃ taratamabhāvena te sadguṇādhikā bhavanti //1//
GV06apastgcu:4434: 1. dhanādiprāptyartha prasthitasya madhye parikṣavādau durnimitte jāte kartavyo japaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4435: arthaprādhvasya parikṣave parikāsane cāpa upaspṛśyottare yathāliṅgaṃ japet // ĀpGs_9.2 //
GV06apastgcu:4443: parikāsanevā durnimitte prāpte prāyaścittaṃ apa upaspṛsyottare ṛcau japet 'anuhavaṃ parihavaṃ'; ityete /
GV06apastgcu:4448: tatra yasmin kṛte prayato manyate tatra tat kuryāt /
GV06apastgcu:4451: atha pūrvasyāmṛci parikṣavaśabda ekatośa- vikṛto liṅgamityucyate tathāpyuttarasyāṃ parikāsanaliṅgaṃ nāstyeva /
GV06apastgcu:4470: iha ca vacanaprayojanaṃ vivāhārtha gaccha to 'pi eteṣu nimtteṣu prāyaścittametat yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:4472: idaṃ tu arthaprādhvasyeti vacanāt sarvārtha ca bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4473: prakaraṇāt vivāhe 'pi svādhyāyasthānaniyamārtha ca mantrayoretayoriha pāṭhaḥ //2//
GV06apastgcu:4480: brahmayajñodaka yagyaghāsādi kamuddiśya samīpadośaṃ prati nirgataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4481_0: tasyaparikṣavekṣavadhau parikāsanekāse ca durnimitte jāte apa upaspṛśya upasparśanamācamanaṃ
GV06apastgcu:4481_1: sparśanamātraṃ vā yathātuṣṭi kṛtvottare 'anuhavaṃ parihavam'ityete yathāliṅgeparikṣave pūrvā,
GV06apastgcu:4484: atra ca yathāliṅgamityanenaitat jñāpayati-pūrvayā varṇavyatyayona parikṣava eva prakāśyaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:4486: yathā caite ṛcau kṣavadhukāsāveva tātparyeṇa prakāśayataḥ,
GV06apastgcu:4488: kecit-yathāliṅgamiti na kevalaṃ parikṣave parikāsane cānayorjapaḥ anyeṣu ca mantraliṅgapratīteṣvanuhavādiṣu durnimitteṣvapīti //2//
GV06apastgcu:4490: evamuttarairyathāliṅgaṃ citriyaṃ vanaspatiṃ śakṛdrīti sigvātaṃ śakunimiti // ĀpGs_9.3 //
GV06apastgcu:4497: citriyaḥprasiddhaḥ tatrārtaprādhvaḥ citriyaṃ vṛkṣamāsādyāpa upaspṛśya 'agnirastvi'ti etayarcānumantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:4501: sigasi nāsīti dīrghānte prāpte chāndaso hrasvaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4502: śakuniṃ śubhāṃ vāca manumantrayeta udgāteva śakune''katyetayarcā aśubhavacane tu prāgukto japaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4523_1: 'nvārabdhāyāṃ sthālīpākāduttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvā
GV06apastgcu:4523_2: tena sarpiṣmatā yugmān dvyavarān brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā sidviṃ vācayīta // ĀpGs_9.4 //
GV06apastgcu:4526: yadi varasya mano vardhvā na tuṣyet atha tassiddhikāmena vadhvāḥ pitrādinā tapoyuktenedaṃ karma kartavyamajñātaṃ varasya /
GV06apastgcu:4529: taduktaṃ purastāt brahmacaryavidhānasya dṛṣṭārthatvāt yāvatā tapasārthasiddhiṃ manyate tāvat kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:4544: pārvaṇātideśāt ekasyaiva brāhmaṇasya bhojane prāpte bahutvaṃ vidhīyate /
GV06apastgcu:4546: sarpiṣmadvacanaṃ niyamārtha pariṣecanādūrdhva pārvaṇadharmāṇāṃ sarpiṣmatvameva bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:4550: katham?yo homasya kartā sa eva vrāhmaṇabhojanaṃ siddhivācanaṃ ca kuryāditi tena yaduttaraṃ karma parikiraṇādi tasya vadhūḥ kartrīti //6//
GV06apastgcu:4555_0: hṛdayasaṃsarga manasossamprītimīpsuḥ vadhvā hitaiṣī pitṛbhrātrādirapāpo 'pi trirātrādanūnaṃ
GV06apastgcu:4557: tenahutaśeṣeṇasarpiṣmatā yugmān dvyavarāndvāvavarau saṃkhyāto yeṣāṃ tānbrāhmaṇānyathālābhaṃbhojayitvātaireva bhuktavadbhiḥ karmaphalasiddhirastvitisiddhiṃ vācayīta /
GV06apastgcu:4558: tena sarpiṣmateti ca pārvaṇasiddhānuvādo yugimāniti vidhātum //4//
GV06apastgcu:4561: śvastiṣyeṇeti trissaptairyavaiḥ pāṭhāṃ parikirati“yadi vāruṇyasi varuṇāttvā niṣkrīṇāmi yadi saumyasi somāttvā niṣkrīṇāmi“iti // ĀpGs_9.5 //
GV06apastgcu:4564_0: śvoyat karaṇīyaṃ karmatattiṣyeṇa nakṣatreṇasampādyata iti kṛtvā pūrvedyussiddhivācanānte
GV06apastgcu:4564_1: karmaṇi kṛte pitrādinā ṛtvijā yajamānabhūtā vadhūḥ yatra pradeśe pāṭhā tiṣṭhati tatra
GV06apastgcu:4569: pāṭhotthāpanādi bhartṛparigrahaṇāntaṃ karma śvobhūte paridyustiṣyo bhavatīti kṛtvā pūrvedyuḥśvastiṣyaḥpunarvasū ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4570: tasmin nakṣatre pitrādinā siddhivācanānte karmaṇi kṛte,
GV06apastgcu:4571: anantaraṃ vadhūryatra bhūmau pāṭhāsti tatra gatvā tāṃpāṭhāṃ trissaptaiḥekaviṃśatyā yavaiḥ 'yadi vāruṇyasi';
GV06apastgcu:4574: śvobhūte uttarayotthāpyottarābhistisṛbhirabhimantryottarayā praticchannāṃ hastayorābadhya śayyākāle bāhubhyāṃ bhartāraṃ parigṛhṇīyādupadhānaliṅgayā // ĀpGs_9.6 //
GV06apastgcu:4577: kṛtvā parikiraṇamupoṣya tataḥśvobūtetāṃ pāṭhāṃ itthāpayati khanitreṇa khātvotkhidatiuttarayarcā “imāṃ khanīmī“tyetayī /
GV06apastgcu:4579: tasyā mūlaṃ dvedhā pracchidya hastayorāvadhnāti uttarayarcā'ahamasmī'tyetayā /
GV06apastgcu:4580: praticchannāṃ yathā bhartā na paśyati tathetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4581: ubhayatra mantrasyāvṛttiḥ ābadhya tato rātrau śayyākāle bhartāraṃ parigṛhṇīyāt /
GV06apastgcu:4582: upadhānaliṅgayāṛcā 'upate 'dhā'mityetayā uttarayeti vaktavye upadhānaliṅgayeti vacanaṃ parigrahe viśeṣavidhānārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4584: anyataradadhastādupadhānaṃ bhavati itaraccopariṣṭādapidhānaṃ tathā parigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ //8//
GV06apastgcu:4587: paredyurvadhūreva tāṃ pāṭhāṃ 'imāṃ khanāmi'ityetayā khamitreṇotkhāya 'uttānaparṇe'ityādibhistisṛbhirabhimantryatasyāḥ mūlaṃ dvidhā chitvā
GV06apastgcu:4588: upāyena bharturadṛśye kṛtvā 'ahamasmi sahamānā'ityetayābhyastayā svahastayorābadhya rātrau śayyākāle 'upate 'dhām'ityupadhānaliṅgayā bāhubhyāṃ bhartāraṃ parigṛhṇīyāt /
GV06apastgcu:4590: kecit-ābadhya pāṭhāmūlayorhastayorupadhānameko 'nyaścāpidhānaṃ yathā syāt tathā parigṛhṇīyāditi //6//
GV06apastgcu:4594: yadi bhāryā bhartari na ramate tadā naivaitatkarma bhavatīti pradarśanārthamidaṃvaśyaḥ patirbhavati bhāryāyāḥ na bhāryā bharturiti //9//
GV06apastgcu:4605: aupāsana evāgniḥ yo 'syā vivāhena sampāditaḥ yā saptanīṃ bādhate /
GV06apastgcu:4607: tathā ca rājasūya ityuktaṃ-“tasyā aupāsane pratinihitam“(āpa.śrau.18-16-14) iti /
GV06apastgcu:4617_0: ya ekayā saṃsṛṣṭahṛdayo 'pyanyāṃ tatsapatnīṃ bhāryā tadadhīnadharmādāvapi lobhānna
GV06apastgcu:4617_1: bādhate so 'pi kathaṃ nu nāma tadadhīnadharmā dyupekṣayāpi tāṃ bādhetaivetyevamarthatvādasya karmaṇaḥ //8 //
GV06apastgcu:4627: etāsminneva kāme vadhūḥ 'udasau sūryo agāt'ityanuvākena prāgbhojanādaharaharādityamupatiṣṭhate /
GV06apastgcu:4628: sadeti vacanaṃ ca siddhe 'pi sapatnībādhanakāme karmāntaraṃ veti //9//
GV06apastgcu:4629: yakṣmagṛhītāmanyāṃ vā brahmacaryayuktaḥ puṣkarasaṃvartamūlairuttarairyathāliṅgamaṅgāni saṃmṛśya pratīcīnaṃ nirasyet // ĀpGs_9.10 //
GV06apastgcu:4633: tena gṛhītāṃbhāryā anyāṃ vā svāṃ striyaṃ mātṛprabhṛtiṃ jñātvā bhaiṣajyamidaṃ kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:4648_0: anyāṃ vā rājayakṣmaṇo 'nyaiḥ kuṣṭhādibhirgṛhītāṃ vā vadhūṃ taddhitaiṣī uktalakṣaṇabrahmacaryayuktaḥpuṣkarasyapadmasya
GV06apastgcu:4650: kecit yakṣmagṛhītāṃ bhāryā anyāṃ vā mātrādiṃ puṣkarasya saṃvartaiḥ parimaṇḍalākāraiḥ mūlairiti //10//
GV06apastgcu:4657: yo 'smin praśne paṭhitān mantrān sārthān veda tasmai /
GV06apastgcu:4660: teṣāṃ vadhūvāsa iti viśeṣaṇamanyasyāḥ striyāḥ yakṣmagṛhītāyāḥ vāsaso dānanivṛttyartham /
GV06apastgcu:4661: etadvida iti ca bhaiṣajyakarmakṛta ityarthaḥ mantreṣu tu parādehi ityādiṣu vivāhakāle parihitasya vadhūvāsasaḥ sparśanindā /
GV06apastgcu:4663: kalpāntare ca tadvyaktam -“caritavrataḥ sūryāvide vadhūvastraṃ dadyāt“(āśva.gṛ. 1.8.13) iti /
GV06apastgcu:4671: etadvideetatkarma samantrārtha yo vetti tasmai 'parā dehi'ityādibhiścata bhrda tasṛbhirdadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:4673: ya etān mantrān sārthān veda tasmai dadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:4675: asya ca samāveśanānantaramupadeṣṭa vyasya ihopadeśo hṛdayasaṃsargārthe karmaṇi śamyājñāpanārthamiti /
GV06apastgcu:4693: yena ācāryakusamupanīyate kumāraḥtadupanayanaṃ nāma karma śrautaḥ puruṣasaṃskāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4699: yatra brahmacāridharmāḥ sāmayācārikeṣu tatraivopanayane 'pyucyamāne sarvacaraṇārthatā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:4710: tathā cāyamarthaḥ- upanayanākhyaṃ karma vaikalpikakalpoktyā vistṛtaṃ balavatpramāṇopapannaṃ asādhāraṇaiśśabdairvakṣyāma iti /
GV06apastgcu:4714: kiñci gṛhyopadiṣṭakarmasu gṛhasthasyaivādhikāro na brahmatāriṇa ityevaṃrūpaṃ viśeṣaṃ jñāpayitumapratijñaṃ vivāhamupadiśya upanayanakalpopadeśaḥ sapratijñaḥ kriyate /
GV06apastgcu:4720: yasmin varṣe garbho bhūtvā śete tadvarṣa garbhaśabdenocyate tadaṣṭamaṃ yeṣāṃ tānīmānigarbhāṣṭamānivarṣāṇi /
GV06apastgcu:4722: apara āha-janmaprabhṛti saptānāṃ varṣāṇāṃ garbhamaṣṭamaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4726: atra ṣaṣṭhasaptamayoḥ kāmyamupanayanaṣṭame nityamityayaṃ viseṣo na syāt /
GV06apastgcu:4728: kiṃca pañcame ṣaṣṭhe vā varṣe vartamāne kathaṃ garbhavarṣamaṣṭamaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4730: tasmāt saptame vartamāna eva garbhavarṣamaṣṭamaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4735: rājanyavaiśyayoḥ viśeṣopadeśā deva garbhāṣṭamavidheḥ brāhmaṇaviṣayatve siddhe brāhmaṇavidhiḥ śrutyanuvāda eva /
GV06apastgcu:4745: tadaṣṭamaṃ yeṣāṃ janmādīnāṃ saptānāṃ tāni garbhāṣṭamāni varṣāṇi /
GV06apastgcu:4748: tathāpi janmādiṣu triṣu caulāntaiḥ garbhasaṃskārairavaruddhatvānna kriyate /
GV06apastgcu:4751: ato 'tropādeyagatā bahutvasaṅkhyā kapiñjalanyāyena garbhādārabhya ṣaṣṭhasaptamāṣṭameṣu triṣvevāvatiṣṭhate,
GV06apastgcu:4753: nanūttaratra 'rājanyaṃ''vaiśya'miti viśeṣopādānādeva garbhāṣṭamavidhirbraahmaṇa syaivetyarthasiddhatvāt brāhmaṇamiti na vaktavyam /
GV06apastgcu:4770: śāstrāntaradṛṣṭānāṃ kālāntarāṇāmihapravṛttirmā bhūdityevaṃ bruvannetat jñāpayati-caulādiṣu śāstrāntaradṛṣṭo 'pi kālaḥ pakṣe bhavatīti //3//
GV06apastgcu:4782: brāhmaṇānbhojayitvā'śiṣo vācayitvā kumāraṃ bhojayitvānuvākasya prathamena yajuṣāpaḥ saṃsṛjyoṣṇāśśītāsvānīyottarayā śira unatti // ĀpGs_10.5 //
GV06apastgcu:4786: tataḥ śvobhūte brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tairāśiṣo vācayati-piṇyāhaṃ svasyṛddhaṃ iti /
GV06apastgcu:4794: uttareṇa yajuṣetyeva siddhe anuvākasya prathamena yajuṣetyuktaṃ saṃjñākaraṇārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4795: tena uṣṇena vāyavudakenetyeṣa ityatrānuvākasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4796: anyathā saṃśayaḥ syāt- anuvāko mantrā veti /
GV06apastgcu:4798: atmanaśca nāpitasya ca yā undanārthāstāḥ saṃsṛjati taccānyeṣāṃ vyaktam-nāpitaṃ śiṣyāt-śīto ṣṇābhirahbhirabartha kurvāṇo 'kṣaṇvan kuśalīkurviti //
GV06apastgcu:4802: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvetyanena yacchrāddhaṃ dharmaśāstre 'śucīn mantravatassarvakṛtyeṣu bhojayet'(āpa.dha.2-15-11)
GV06apastgcu:4816: atra ca kumārasya snavabhojanātprāk 'yajñopavītaṃ paramaṃ pavitram'ityādimantreṇa yajñopavītadhāraṇam /
GV06apastgcu:4817: 'bhojana ācamane svādhyāye ca yajñopavītī syāt'iti dharmaśāstravacanāt //
GV06apastgcu:4826: atra cānuvākagrahaṇaṃ gṛhyamantrāssamāmnātā eva na kalpasūtrasthā iti jñāpanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4830: trīṃstrīn darbhānantardhāyottarābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratimantraṃ pratidiśaṃ pravapati // ĀpGs_10.6 //
GV06apastgcu:4834: tena pūrva mantravadvapanaṃ karotyācāryaḥ paścānnāpita ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4835: tatrāyaṃ prayogaḥ kumārasya śirasi prācyāṃ diśi trīn darbhānantardhāya 'yenāvapa'dityetayā pracchinatti kṣureṇa /
GV06apastgcu:4836: asāvityabya sthāne tasya nāma pthamayā vibhaktyā gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:4840: athāpa upaspṛśya tathaiva dakṣiṇyāṃ diśi 'yena pūṣe'ti /
GV06apastgcu:4843: atra saṃbudhyā nāmagrahaṇaṃ-tena te vapāmi yajñadattaśarmmannāyuṣeti //5//
GV06apastgcu:4846: tato 'yenāvapat'ityādibhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratimantraṃ pratidiśaṃ trīṃstrīn darbhānantardhāya keśān pravapati /
GV06apastgcu:4848: tatra prathame mantre asāvityasya sthāne viṣṇuśarmeti kumārasya nāmagrahaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:4850: vapantamuttarayānumantrayate dakṣiṇato mātā brahmacārī vā // ĀpGs_10.7 /
GV06apastgcu:4853: evamāryeṇa pratidiśaṃ pravapane kṛte nāpitastasya keśān vapati saṃsṛṣṭābhirevādbhirabartha kurvāṇaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4857: dakṣiṇata upaviśya kumārasyamātā brahmacarī vā kaścit 'yat kṣureṇa'ityetayāvapantamācāryamanumantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:4862: ānaḍuhe śakṛtpiṇḍe yavānnidhāya tasmin keśānupayamyottarayodumbaramūle darbhastambe vā nidadhāti // ĀpGs_10.8 //
GV06apastgcu:4865_0: atha kumārasyamātā brahmacārī vā kaścit tasya dakṣiṇata upaviśya kasmiścit pātre
GV06apastgcu:4865_1: ānaḍuhaṃ śakṛtpiṇḍaṃ kṛtvā yavāśca tasmin piṇḍaṃ nidhāya tasmin keśānupayacchati
GV06apastgcu:4865_2: upagṛhṇāti yathā bhūmau na patanti tathā sarvānupayamya tatastān keśānudumbarasya
GV06apastgcu:4870: upanayanasya prakṛtatvānmātā brahmacārī vā 'uptvāya keśān'ityetayāānaḍuhe śakṛtpiṇḍeityādi yathopadeśaṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:4880: snātamagnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte pālāśīṃ samidhamuttarayā'dhāpyottareṇāgniṃ dakṣiṇena padāśmanamāsthāpayatyātiṣṭheti // ĀpGs_10.9 //
GV06apastgcu:4898: ādhāpya samidhamuttareṇāgniṃ aśmānaṃpratiṣṭhitamanenāsthāpayati dakṣiṇena padā 'ātiṣṭhema'miti mantreṇa /
GV06apastgcu:4901: tenācāryo mantramuktatvā dhatriṇaṃ pādaṃ hastābhyāṃ gṛhītvāśmani nidhāpayati //8//

GV06apastgcu:6211: āpaḥ pādyā iti prakaraṇādeva siddhe pādagrahaṇamuttaratra pādapratyayo mābhūdityevamartham /
GV06apastgcu:6215: atha pūjyastā apaḥ 'āpaḥ pādāvanejanīḥ'ityetayābhimantrya prathamaṃdakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ brāhmaṇāyaprakṣālayitre prayacchet /
GV06apastgcu:6220: anye tu-kṣatriyavaiśyābhyāṃ aniyamena pūrva pādaṃ prayacchediti //5//

GV06apastgcu:6235: kūrcābhyāṃ parigṛhya mṛnmayenār 'haṇīyā āpa 'iti prāha // ĀpGs_13.7 //

GV06apastgcu:6242: athārhayitā mṛnmaye pātra arhaṇārthāḥ puṣpākṣatasaṃyuktāḥ apa ānīya,
GV06apastgcu:6254: atha pūjyastā apaḥ 'āmāgan'ityetayābhimantrya tāsāmekadeśe stoke svāñjalau dātrāānīyamāne'virājo dohī'si'iti yajurjapet //8//
GV06apastgcu:6258: atha tāsāmapāṃ śeṣaṃ pṛrvasyāṃ diśi nayati pradātā /
GV06apastgcu:6259: tat nīyamānaṃuttarayarcā' samudraṃ va'ityetayābhimantrayate pūjyamānaḥ mānaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6260: etasminkāle vastrayugalaṃ kuṇḍalayugaṃ gāṃ srajaṃ yaccānyadalaṅkaraṇārtha tatsarva dadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:6265: atha tāsāṃ śeṣaṃ dātrā purastāt nīyamānaṃ pūjyaḥ 'samudraṃ vaḥ'ityetayā anumantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:6266: kecit-asmin kāle bhojanānte vā pūjyāya vastrakuṇḍalayugādyālaṅkaraṇaṃ dātavyam;
GV06apastgcu:6270: dadhi madhviti saṃsṛjya kāṃsyena varṣīyasā pidhāya kūrcābhyāṃ parigṛhya 'madhuparka 'iti prāha // ĀpGs_13.10 //

GV06apastgcu:6276: itiśabdaḥ prakāre-dadhi madhviti vā payo madhviti veti //10//
GV06apastgcu:6280: tato varṣīyasā bṛhatā kāṃsyena pātreṇa pidhāya /
GV06apastgcu:6289: pūrvokte dve dadhi madhviti vā payo madhviti vā,
GV06apastgcu:6294: tasmin pakṣe pūrvokte dadhimadhunī ghṛtaṃ ca saṃsarjanīyāni //11//
GV06apastgcu:6305: uttarābhyāmabhintrya yajurbhyāmapa ācāmati purastādupariṣṭāccottarayā triḥ prāśyānukampyāya prayacchet // ĀpGs_13.13 //

GV06apastgcu:6315: tatra prayogaḥ amṛtopastaraṇasītyupastaraṇīyā apa ācamya madhuparka mantreṇa prāśyācamya evaṃ dvistūṣṇīṃ prāśyāpidhānīyā apa ācāmati /
GV06apastgcu:6317: śeṣaṃ madhuparkaprāśanaśeṣaṃanukampyāyaanugrāhyāya putrāya bhrātre vā samāvṛttāyaiva prayacchet /

GV06apastgcu:6405: śrapayitvā tāmupastīrṇābhighāritāṃ madhyamenāntamena vā palāśaparṇenottarayarcā ' gniḥ prāśnātvi'tyetayā tasminnevāgnau juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:6407: hutvā tato māṃsaṃ saṃskṛtyānnena saha tasmā upaharanti /
GV06apastgcu:6409: palāśaparṇenetyeva siddhe madhyamenāntamenetivacanaṃ dviparṇasya palāśavṛntasya parṇena homo mā bhūditi /
GV06apastgcu:6410: abhāvavikalpārtha vā pūrva madhyamena tadabhāve antameneti //17//
GV06apastgcu:6415: amuṣyetyasya sthāne cārhayiturnāma viṣṇuśarmaṇa iti gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:6418: abhimantryeti ca ktavāpratyayaḥ kriyāvidhāna mātrārtha eva,
GV06apastgcu:6423: madhyamenāntamena vā palāśaparṇena laukikenājyenopastīrya kṛtsnāṃ vapāṃ sakṛdevāvadāyābhighārya 'agniḥ prāśanātu'ityetayā tena parṇena svāgenau juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:6424: tatra ca madhyamenāntamena veti vacanaṃ dviparṇapratiṣedhārthamabhāvavikalpārtha vā /
GV06apastgcu:6426: ayaṃ ca saṃjñapanapakṣaḥ kaliyugānācāreṣu paṭhitatvādidānīṃ tyājya eva //16//
GV06apastgcu:6431: atha yadi gāmutsṛjatyayaṃ pūjyamānaḥ sa gauriti prokte mantrān uttarāṃścaturo 'yajñe vardhatā'mityupāṃśu japati /
GV06apastgcu:6437: japatvādeva siddhe upāṃśuvacanaṃ niyamārtham-uttare catvāra eva mantrāḥ
GV06apastgcu:6443: tena brahmaṇaḥ evaiṣa vikalpaḥ siddho bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6449: tadottarān trīn mantrān 'yajño vardhatām'ityādikānupāṃśu japitvā ' omutsṛjata' ityuccaiḥprabrūyāditi śeṣaḥ /

GV06apastgcu:6481: tebhyaścaturbhyaḥ parisaṃvatsaraṃ vipreṣyopatiṣṭhadbhyaḥ gṛhamātiśyenāgatebhyaḥ etadapacitkarma kūrcādi bhojanāntaṃ kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:6489: tena vivāhāda- nantaraṃ ācāryaśvaśurābhyāṃ nimantryāpacitiḥ kartavyā /

GV06apastgcu:6495: yadetadarhaṇaṃ kūrcādi bhojanāntaṃ gṛhasthena snātakāya snānadivasa evāgatāya kartavyamiti vihitaṃ,

GV06apastgcu:6507: utyate- iha vikalpena vihitasya trivṛtaḥ pāṅktasya ca tasmin gomadhuparke avedādhyāyāya śvaśurāya ca dīyamāne ca prāptyartham /

GV06apastgcu:6514: sakṛt na prativatasaraṃ kalau gorālambhsya nṣedhādraurityuttkā yajño vardhatāmityādi japet madhyamantralopaḥ)
GV06apastgcu:6515: pravaktre vedasya vedārthasya ca citrāya prasiddhāya bhinnasaṃśayāyetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6519: pravaktā yaḥ padavākyapramāṇābhyāṃ prakarṣeṇa vakti sādhuśabdānāmuccārayitā,
GV06apastgcu:6521: citraḥ prakāśaḥ loke prasiddha ityarthaḥ . idaṃ pravaktureva viśeṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:6530: tena gṛhye yājñikaprasiddhyā madhuparkasaṃśike karmaṇi upadiṣṭā eva dharmāḥ 'gomadhiparkarahaḥ'ityatra madhuparkanāmnā atidiśyante,
GV06apastgcu:6536: 'dadhimadhusaṃsṛṣṭaṃ madhuparkaḥ'iti pratyakṣavidhānādatideśaprāptaṃ trivṛttvaṃ pāṅktatvaṃ ca bādhyata(āpa.śrau.2-8-8) iti /
GV06apastgcu:6537: ayamatra niścitor'thaḥ ācāryāyartvije vedādhyāyāya śvaśurāya rājñe ca dakṣiṇārthādhikagavā vinā gārhyaḥ sāmayācāriko vā madhiparkaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6541: avedādhyāyābhyāṃ tu varāpacitābhyāṃ snātakāya ca snānadina evāgatāya gavā vinā gṛhyokto dharmokto vā /

GV06apastgcu:6775: nyagrodhasya yā prācyudīcīṃ vā śākhā tatassavṛṣaṇāṃ śuṅgāmāhṛtya sīmantavadagnerupasamādhānādi // ĀpGs_14.10 //

GV06apastgcu:6805: 3 tānaṅkurānanṛtumatyā kumāryā peṣayitvottānaṃ śāyitāyā garbhiṇyā dakṣiṇanāsāyāṃ niṣecanam /

GV06apastgcu:6843: puṃsuvanasya tu paścādupadeśo yathā caturthe māsi tatkriyate tasya paścāt prayogārtha iti //14//
