GV06apastgcu:6851: tata ūrdhva tu yatra yatra garbhe putrepsā tatra tatra kartavyaṃ nānyatra /
GV06apastgcu:6852: yastvatikrānta- codanaḥ strīreva janayeyamiti kāmayate tasya sakṛdapi na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6853: anye tu-pumāṃsaṃ janayatītyetadvacanaṃ garbhe garbhe 'sya kartavyatāparamiti //12//
GV06apastgcu:6858: yena karmaṇā kṣipraṃ sūyate tatkṣipraṃsuvanaṃnāma karmocyate //15//
GV06apastgcu:6861: yenakṣipraṃśīghraṃ sūte 'ntarvatnī na ciraṃ kālaṃ pīḍyate tatkṣipraṃsuvanaṃnāma iti karmopadiśyate //13//
GV06apastgcu:6862: anāprītena śarāveṇānusrotasamudakamāhṛtya pattastūryantīṃ nidhāya mūrdhañchoṣyantīmuttareṇa yajuṣābhimṛśyaitābhiradbhiruttarābhiravokṣet // ĀpGs_14.14 //
GV06apastgcu:6866: pattaḥpādayoradhastāt yasyāḥ śvetopamāni patrāṇi pītopa- māni puṣpāṇi yā ca madhyāṅṇe puṣyati sā tīryantī vaneṣu jāyate /
GV06apastgcu:6867: veṇupatropamāni ca yasyāḥ patrīṇi raktopamāni ca puṣpāṇi yāṃ cāgniśikhetyāhuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6868: sā śoṣyantī tat oṣadhidvayaṃ samūlapatramādāya suṣliṣṭaṃ nidadhāti /
GV06apastgcu:6872: daśabhiriti liṅgādubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāmabhimarśanam anulomaṃ mukhādārabhya tata etābhirāhṛtābhirevādbhistāmavokṣet /
GV06apastgcu:6873: uttarābhistisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ'yathaiva somaḥ pavata'ityetābhiḥ pratimantra mavokṣaṇam //16//
GV06apastgcu:6880: śoṣyantīṃprasavapīḍayā śuṣyamāṇāṃ striyaṃ 'ābhiṣṭvāhaṃ daśabhirabhibhūmṛśāmi'iti yajuṣobhābhyāṃ hastābhyām /
GV06apastgcu:6890: tāṃ mūrdhniṃ nidhāya striyaṃ yatra kvacābhimṛśediti /
GV06apastgcu:6914: kṣipraṃsuvane yo vidhiścoditaḥ 'anāprītena śarāveṇe'tyādi (evaṃ vihitābhiradbhiḥ uttarābhyāṃmantrābhyāṃ“tisadeva padyasva,
GV06apastgcu:6921: yadi prasūtāyāstasyājarāyugarbhaprāvaraṇaṃna patettadā'anāprītena śarāveṇa'ityādividhinā'hṛtābhiradbhiḥ aitu garbhau akṣitaḥ'
GV06apastgcu:6927: iti śrīsudarśanācāryaviracite gṛhyatātparyadarśane caturdaśaḥ khaṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:6933: jātaṃ vātsapreṇābhimṛśyottareṇa yajuṣopastha ādhāyottarābhyamābhimantraṇaṃ mūrdhanyavaghrāṇaṃ dakṣiṇe karṇe jāpaḥ // ĀpGs_15.1 //
GV06apastgcu:6936: jātamiti pulliṅgasya vivakṣitatvāt puṃsa evāyaṃ jātakarmākhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6943: uttaratra māturiti viśeṣaṇādiha sva upastha ādadhāti /
GV06apastgcu:6944: uttarābhiriti pāṭhaḥ uttarābhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ abhimantraṇādīni trīṇi kartavyāni /
GV06apastgcu:6949: kecittu uttarābhyāmiti dvivacanāntapāṭhamāśritya dvayormantrayoḥ triṣvapi karmasu viniyogaṃ manyante /
GV06apastgcu:6951: āśvalāyanaścāha-karṇayorupanidhāya medhājananaṃ japati medhāṃ te devassaviteti (āśva.śrau.1-13-2) //1//
GV06apastgcu:6959: ityanuvākena ante sakṛdabhimṛśya 'asminnaham'ityanena yajuṣā svasyopasthe tamādhāya,
GV06apastgcu:6962: etayorevarcoḥ dakṣiṇe karṇe jāpo japa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6972: ata evāśvalāyanaḥ -“karṇayorupanidhāya me dhājananaṃ japati'medhāṃ te devassavitā'iti” /
GV06apastgcu:6987: asyārthaḥ-rohiṇī revatī maghā mṛgaśīrṣā jyeṣṭhā titrā-ityeteṣu ādyakṣaranirdiṣṭeṣu ādau vṛddhirbavati,
GV06apastgcu:6990: rūpaṃ ca rauhiṇaḥ raivataḥ māghaḥ mārgaśīrṣaḥ jyaiṣṭhaḥ caitraḥ iti /
GV06apastgcu:6991: ṣṭhātpe ca, proṣṭhapadetyatra ṣṭhakārātpare pakāre ca vṛddhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6997: śravaḥ śravaṇaṃ śa-śatabhiṣak aśvayuk ityeteṣu caturṣu vā vikalpena vṛddhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6998: atra ca śravaṇāpabharaṇyoḥ bahulagrahaṇādeva luko vikalpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7005: śeṣeṣu na uktādanyeṣu nakṣatreṣu na vṛddhiḥ yato 'tra 'śraviṣṭhāphalgunyanūrādhāsvātitiṣyapunarvasuhasta viśākhāṣāḍhābahulālluk'; (pā.sū.4-3-34)
GV06apastgcu:7006: ityanena, nakṣatrebhyo bahulam'ityanena ca lugva bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7008: iti strīpratyayanivṛttiḥ kṛttikaḥ tiṣyaḥ āśreṣaḥ phālgunaḥ hastaḥ viśākhaḥ anūrādhaḥ āṣāḍhaḥ śraviṣṭhaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7019: evaṃ sarveṣāṃ nakṣatranāmnāṃ prathamayā nirdeśaḥ sūktavāke /
GV06apastgcu:7025: yathā pare na jānanti tathā vaktavyamityarthaḥ sūktavākādiṣvapyevameva //3//
GV06apastgcu:7028: nakṣatranāma ca rahasyaṃ nirdiśatīti sūtre praṇetavye sūtrāntarakaraṇāt yat nāmanakṣatranibandhanaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:7029: yacca daśamyāṃ kṛtaṃ tadubhayaṃ jātakarma sūktavākānnaprāśanābhivādanādiṣu nityaṃ rahasyameva nirdeśyaṃ bhavati //3//
GV06apastgcu:7032_0: madhu, ghṛtamiti saṃsṛjya tasmin darbheṇa hiraṇyaṃ niṣṭarkya badhvāvadāyottarairmantraiḥ
GV06apastgcu:7032_1: kumāraṃ prāśayitvottarābhiḥ pañcabhissnāpayitvā dadhi ghṛtamiti saṃsṛjya kāṃsyena
GV06apastgcu:7032_2: pṛṣadājyaṃ vyāhṛtībhiroṅgāracaturthābhiḥ kumāraṃ prāśayitvādbhiśśeṣaṃ saṃsṛjya goṣṭhe
GV06apastgcu:7035: madhughṛtamityetadvayaṃ viṣamaparimāṇaṃ kāsyapātre saṃsṛjya tasmin hiraṇyaṃ darbheṇa,
GV06apastgcu:7038: tathā baddhena hiraṇyena tadrasadvayamādāya tenaiva kumāraṃ prāśayet /
GV06apastgcu:7041: tato 'nyasmin kāṃsyapātre dadhi ghṛtañca saṃsṛḍya tatpṛṣadāḍyaṃ tenaiva kāṃsyena prāśayati /
GV06apastgcu:7044: kumāragrahaṇaṃ asamarthasyāpi kumārasyaiva prāśanamupāyena yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:7045: tena yatnābhāve“dhānāḥ kumārān prāśayanti““kṣaitrapattyaṃ ca prāśayanti“ityādau prāśanamasamarthānāṃ na bhavati //4//
GV06apastgcu:7048: niṣṭakarya śikhābandhanavat sarandhreṇa granthinā niṣṭarkya badhnāti;
GV06apastgcu:7059: tacca yasmin kāṃsye saṃsṛjyate tenaiva prāśayenna hastena /
GV06apastgcu:7067: uttarayā māturupastha ādhāyottarayā dakṣiṇaṃ stanaṃ pratidhāpyottarābhyāṃ pṛthivīmabhimṛśyottareṇa yajuṣā saṃviṣṭam // ĀpGs_15.5 //
GV06apastgcu:7073: tatauttarayarcā'ayaṃ kumāra'ityetayādakṣiṇaṃ stanaṃ pratidhāpya tata uttarābhyāṃ ṛgbhyāṃ'yadbhūmerhṛdaya'mityetābhyāṃ pratimantraṃ pṛthivīmabhimṛśati /
GV06apastgcu:7074: tataḥ taṃ kumāraṃ abhimṛṣāṭāyāṃ bhūmau saṃveśayati mātā /
GV06apastgcu:7079: iha ca mātṛgrahaṇāditaḥ pūrva svopastha eva /
GV06apastgcu:7085: 'vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāte yadaṣṭakapālo bhavati gāyatriyaivainaṃ brahmavarcasena punāti'(tai.saṃ.2-2-5)
GV06apastgcu:7086: ityādinā yadyapi putrajanmākhyānimittasaṃyogena śrutā tathāpi kṣāmavatyādivanna nimittādanantaraṃ kartavyā /
GV06apastgcu:7088: jāteṣṭhipravṛtteścotkaṭajīvatputragatapūtatādiphalarāgādhīnatvāt dīrghakālasamāpyāyāṃ ceṣṭau kṛtāyāṃ paścādvaidhastanamāne sati kumāra eva śeṣī śiṣkaṇṭhatayā na jīvet /
GV06apastgcu:7091: iṣṭistūktena nyāyena nimittasvārasyabhaṅgasya durnivāratvāt codakānugrahāccāśauce 'pagate parvaṇyeva kartavyā /
GV06apastgcu:7095_0: uttareṇa yajuṣā śirasta udkumbhaṃ nidhāya sarṣapān phalīkaraṇamiśrānañjalinottaraistristriḥ
GV06apastgcu:7095_1: pratisvāhākāraṃ hutvā saṃśāsti -praviṣṭe praviṣṭa eva tūṣṇīmagnāvāvapateti // ĀpGs_15.6 //
GV06apastgcu:7098: tatastasya śirassamīpe uttareṇa yajuṣā'āpassupteṣvi'tyanena udakumbhaṃ nidadhāti /
GV06apastgcu:7112: etaduktaṃ bhavati-asya sūtikāgārasya yadā yadā praveśo yuṣmābhiḥ kriyate tadā tadā sarṣapān phalīkaraṇa-
GV06apastgcu:7113: miśranasminnagnāvevaṃ tūṣṇīmāvapata yathā mayoptāḥ añjalinā triltriśceti /
GV06apastgcu:7120: tena yadyapi'yasyai vijātāyāṃ mana'iti māturapi rakṣā pratīyate tathāpi
GV06apastgcu:7122: tataśca strīprasave daśāhamadhye putramṛtau ca na bhavati // 6 //
GV06apastgcu:7125: uttareṇa 'āpassupteṣu'ityanenayajuṣā kumārasya śirassamīpe udakasya pūrṇakumbhaṃ nidhāya atha 'yatra kva tāgnim'; (āya.dha.2-1-23)
GV06apastgcu:7126: ityādividhinā śrotriyāgārādagnimāhṛtya tamupanidhāyaphalīkaraṇamiśrān sarṣapān uttaraiḥ'ayaṃ kalim'ityādibhiraṣṭabhirmantraiḥ añjalinā pratimantraṃtrisrirjuhoti /
GV06apastgcu:7131: sampraiṣasya cāyaṃ vivakṣitor'thaḥ-- pratipraveśaṃ tadanantarameva sarṣapān phalīkaraṇamiśrān añjalinā asminnevāgnau tūṣṇīṃ vāgyatā eva āvapateti /
GV06apastgcu:7132: eva kārācca praveśāvāpayormadhye truṭimātrasyāpi kālasya na kṣepaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7141: vijananaprabhṛti yāvat daśāhāni na nirgacchanti tāvadeva homaḥ kartavyaḥ saṃśānañcetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7143: yadyapi saṃśāsanamanantaraṃ tathāpi tāvanmātrasyāyamatideśo na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7157: daśamyāmutthitāyāṃ snātāyāṃ putrasya nāma dadhāti pitā māteti // ĀpGs_15.8 //
GV06apastgcu:7162: yaccanyat striyo viduḥ tacca sarvavarmānāṃ daśame 'hani bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7165: tatra paribhāṣāvaśādahanyeva karma snānaṃ ca sati sambhave tasminnevāhani niyamena bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7166: prakāraṇādeva siddhe putrasyeti vacanaṃ vakṣyamāṇo 'nāmno lakṣaṇaviśeṣaḥ'tasyaiva yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:7170: pitā māteti tā ca dadaturyadagre“(tai.saṃ.1-5-10) iti /
GV06apastgcu:7172: diti brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā pitāmātā ca nāmāgre 'bhivyāhṛtyāśīrvacanaṃ brāhmaṇairabhivyāhārayetām /
GV06apastgcu:7179: evaṃ vadatā daśame 'hani niṣkramya snātavyamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7186: imamartha mantravarṇe 'pyāha“mama nāma prathamaṃ jātavedaḥ pitā mātā ca dadhaturyadagre” (tai.saṃ.1-5-100 iti //8//
GV06apastgcu:7189: dvyakṣaraṃ caturakṣaraṃ vā nāmapūrvamākhyātottaraṃ dīrghābhiniṣṭhānāntaṃ ghoṣavadādyantarantastham // ĀpGs_15.9 //
GV06apastgcu:7195_0: taduttarapadaṃ yatra tatākhyātottaraṃ dīrghātparo 'bhiniṣṭhāno visarjanīyo 'nte yasya
GV06apastgcu:7195_2: antasthā yasya tatantarantasthamvargāṇāṃ tṛtīyacaturthau ikāraśca ghoṣavantaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7202: “ṛṣyaṇūkaṃ devātāṇūkaṃ vā yathā vaiṣāṃ pūrvapuruṣāṇāṃ nāmāni syu“riti (bau.gṛ.2 -2-28,29)
GV06apastgcu:7209: atha vyavasthāpanīyasya nāmno lakṣaṇamucyate-dvyakṣaraṃ caturakṣaraṃveti samāse 'bhipretaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:7213: kutaḥ punarvākyasamāsayorartavatsamudāyatvāviśeṣe'pi samāsa eva dravyavācako na vākyam?
GV06apastgcu:7221: nanu-'supsupā'iti samāsaniyamāt ākhyātena tiṅantena naiva samāsaḥ?
GV06apastgcu:7222: satyam;ata evātra ākhyātaśabdena ākhyāta sadṛśaṃ kvibantaṃ subantameva vivakṣitam /
GV06apastgcu:7241: api vā yasmin svityupasargassyāt taddhi pratiṣṭhitamiti hi brāhmaṇam // ĀpGs_15.10 //
GV06apastgcu:7244: api vā ayamapi pakṣaḥyasminnāmni 'su'ityayamupasargaḥ syāt devatatra lakṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:7250: tathāca pūrvāsminneva lakṣaṇe sthitvā bharadvāja āha-dvyakṣaraṃ caturakṣaraṃ vā ghoṣavadādyantarantasthaṃ dīrghābhiniṣṭhānāntaṃ taddhi prasiddhamiti vijñāyate iti /
GV06apastgcu:7254: upasarga iti vacanātsomasudityādi pratiṣṭhitaṃ na bhavati //10//
GV06apastgcu:7259: iha brāhmaṇagrahaṇāt dvyakṣarādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sviti viśeṣaṇaṃ vikalpyate /
GV06apastgcu:7263: atra bodhāyano vikalpāntarāṇyāha-'ṛṣyaṇūkaṃ devatāṇūkaṃ vā yathā vaiṣāṃ pūrvapuruṣāṇāṃ nāmāni syuḥ'iti /
GV06apastgcu:7275: yā skhyā arthavimituṃ na śakyate sā ayuk saṃkhyā /
GV06apastgcu:7276: ayuñji akṣarāṇi yatra tat ayujākṣaram-ekākṣaraṃ tryakṣaramityādi /
GV06apastgcu:7292: kumāryā api jātakādayaścaulāntāḥ dehaṃsaskārārthāḥ kriyāstūṣṇīṃ kartavyā eva /
GV06apastgcu:7297: iha ca dravyaniṣṭhā bhāvārthāḥ prāśanavapanādaya eva niṣkṛṣya kartavyāḥ,
GV06apastgcu:7301: pravāsādetya putrasyottarābhyāmabhimantraṇaṃ mūrdhanyavaghrāṇaṃ dakṣiṇe karṇa uttarān mantrān japet // ĀpGs_15.12 //
GV06apastgcu:7309: mantraliṅgāt kumāryā abhimantraṇāntaropadeśācca siddhe putragrahaṇaṃ mūrdhanyavaghrāṇaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karṇe jāpaśca kumāryā mā bhūt /
GV06apastgcu:7310: anyathā liṅgavirodhābhāvāt ubhayaṃ kumāryā api syāt /
GV06apastgcu:7312: kumārīmuttareṇetyayaṃ ca abhimantraṇasyaiva pratyāmnāyaḥ syāt, netarayoḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7313: uttare mantrāḥ 'agnirāyuṣmāniti pañce'tyādiṣṭāḥ tān putrasyadakṣiṇe karṇe japet /
GV06apastgcu:7314: mantragrahaṇaṃ kriyate 'agnirāyuṣmāniti pañce'tyasya pañcaśabdasya mantreṣu vṛttiriti prajñāpanārtham //12//
GV06apastgcu:7319: asāvityasya sthāne daśamyāṃ kṛtaṃ nāma sambuddhyā gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:7324: tataḥ putrasyadakṣiṇe karṇe uttarān'agnirāyuṣmān sa vanaspatibhiḥ'ityādikān sānuṣaṅgān pañcamantrān japet /
GV06apastgcu:7332: duhitaramiti kartavye kumārīmiti vacanaṃ pradānādūrdhva mābhūditi /
GV06apastgcu:7333: putrasya tu yāvajjīvaṃ bhavati putre 'pi proṣitāgate abhimantraṇāditrayaṃ bhavati nyāyasya tulyasya tulyatvāt //13//
GV06apastgcu:7345: janmano 'dhi ṣaṣṭhe māsi brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā'śiṣo vācayitvā dadhi madhu ghṛtamodanamiti saṃsṛjyottarairmantraiḥ kumāraṃ prāśayet // ĀpGs_16.1 //
GV06apastgcu:7352: tatkariṣyan brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā yugmān tairāśiṣo vācayati-puṇyāhaṃ svasti ṛddhimiti /
GV06apastgcu:7355: yatrāpagedyuḥ devejyā tatra pūrvedyuḥ pitṛbhyaḥ kriyate /
GV06apastgcu:7359: vācayitvā'śiṣaḥ dadhyādi catuṣṭayaṃ saṃsṛjya tena kumāraṃ prāśayet /
GV06apastgcu:7366: kumāraṃ iti canāt kumāryā vidhivadannaprāśanaṃ na bhavati-āvṛtaiva kumāryā (āśva.gṛ.1-14-7)
GV06apastgcu:7372: tena mārgaśīrṣa śukle dvitīyāyāṃ jātasya na mārgaśīrṣo māsaḥ pūrṇo gaṇyate /
GV06apastgcu:7377: āśīrvacanānantaraṃ dadhyādicatuṣṭayaṃ saṃsṛjyauttarairmantraiḥ ' bhūrapāṃtvauṣadhīnāṃ'ityādibhiścaturbhiḥ kumāraṃ sakṛdeva prāśayot /
GV06apastgcu:7388: anye tu māṃsameva mantravat prāśyaṃ manyante /
GV06apastgcu:7395: janmano 'dhi tṛtīye varṣe caulaṃ punarvasvoḥ // ĀpGs_16.3 //
GV06apastgcu:7399: atha causavidhiḥ -yasmin karmaṇi keśāḥ prathamaṃ khaṇḍyate tat caulaṃ /
GV06apastgcu:7403: janmanaḥ prabhṛti tṛtīye varṣe punarvasevornakṣatre kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:7404: kumāraṃ prāśayediti vihitatvāt puṃsa evedaṃ vidhivaccaulam /
GV06apastgcu:7407: janmagrahaṇaṃ garbhādārabhya tṛtīye varṣe mā bhūditi //3//
GV06apastgcu:7422: brāhmaṇabhojanādīti brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā'śiṣo vācayitvā kumāraṃ bhojayitvetyetāvadiha draṣṭavyam /
GV06apastgcu:7449: keśān vinīya yatharṣi śikhā nidadhāti // ĀpGs_16.6 //
GV06apastgcu:7456: yathārṣiyāvanta ṛṣayo yasya pravare tāvatīśśikhāḥ karoti-tryārṣeyasya tisnaḥ pañcārṣeyasya pañceti //6//
GV06apastgcu:7469: athavāyathāyena prakāreṇaeṣāṃkumārasya kulajānāṃkuladharmaḥpravartate tathā śikhāṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:7470: eṣāṃ iti vacanaṃ kartuḥ kuladharmo mā bhūditi /
GV06apastgcu:7471: tenāsmin karmaṇi pitaiva karteti niyamo nāsti /
GV06apastgcu:7472: anyatra tu sati sambhave kumārakarmasu tasyaiva niyamaḥ //7//
GV06apastgcu:7475: athavā-yathā yena prakāreṇa eṣāṃ kulajānāṃ kuladharmaḥ pravartate,
GV06apastgcu:7503: tena kṣureṇa triṣvahorātreṣu nāpitakarma na kartavyam //10//
GV06apastgcu:7511: asminkarmaṇi samāpte kumārasya pitā brahmaṇe varaṃ dadāti /
GV06apastgcu:7515: varaṃ gāṃ pitā dadāti dakṣiṇata asīnāya brāhmaṇāya /
GV06apastgcu:7519: evaṃ godānamanyasminnapi nakṣatre ṣoḍaśe varṣe // ĀpGs_16.12 //
GV06apastgcu:7523: yathā caulaṃ evamasya godānākhyamapi karma kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:7543: agnirdevatā yatra godāne tadagnigodānaṃ yasya vaso 'gnigodānaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7554: āgneyānāṃ kāṇḍānāṃ upākaraṇasamāpanayoryaḥ kalpaḥ tatra cauladharmāḥ pravartanta iti /
GV06apastgcu:7557: asyāsmin gṛhye 'nupadiṣṭatvāt yat godānamupadiṣṭaṃ tatraiva śamyāvidhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7558_0: tatra prayogaḥ brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā'śiṣo vācayitvā tūṣṇīṃ keśaśmaśru vāpayitvāgnerupasamādhānādi
GV06apastgcu:7570: asmin pakṣe ājyabhāgānte kṛte 'agnaye kāṇḍarṣaye svāhā'ityājyenaivaikā pradhānāhutiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7579: agnigodāne tu kāṇḍopākaraṇātideśāt nityameva yadā vratacaryā tadā varadānādūrdhva devatopasthānaṃ pūrvavadante,
GV06apastgcu:7604: atra ca vāpayata iti ṇijantanirdeśādācārya eva godānakarmaṇaḥ kartā /
GV06apastgcu:7606: tathātra śikhāyā api vapanaṃ 'etāvannānā sarvān keśānvāpayate'ityasmādeva vacanāt ;satravat /
GV06apastgcu:7607: anya āhuḥ 'rikto vā eṣo 'napihito yanmuḍastasyaitadapidhānaṃ yacchikheti /
GV06apastgcu:7609: iti satrebhyo 'nyatra śikhāyā vapanagratiṣedhāt ihāpi naiva śkhāyā vapanamiti //15//
GV06apastgcu:7630: te ca 'śālīnasyodavasāya'iti vacanābhāve gṛha eva kartavyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7642: tatra yasmin pradeśe 'gāraṃ cikīrṣitaṃ so 'gārāvakāśaḥ sa dakṣiṇāpratyakpravaṇobhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7645: tamagārāvakāśaṃ uddhanti khanitreṇa khanati yathā pāṃsava utpadyante /
GV06apastgcu:7646: uddhatya tān pāsūn pālāśena samīyena vodūhena etāmeva diśaṃ prati uttarayarcā'yadbhūmeḥ krūra'mityetayāudūhatiunnatāt pradeśāt avanate prāpayati /
GV06apastgcu:7650: yo 'gārārthatvenābhipareto 'vakāśo bhūmibhāgo dakṣiṇāpratyakpravaṇaḥdakṣiṇāpratīcyāṃ naitṛtyāṃ diśi nimnastamuddhatya khanitrādinā pāṃsūnutkhādya pālāśena śamīmayena vodūhena,
GV06apastgcu:7667: kḷptamuttarayābhimṛśya pradakṣiṇaṃ sthūṇāgartān khānayitvābhyantaraṃ pāṃsūnudupyottarābhyāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dvārasthūṇāmavadadhāti // ĀpGs_17.3 //
GV06apastgcu:7671: evamudūhya tatastaṃ bhūmibāgaṃ kalpayanti yathā sarvatassamaṃ sampadyate /
GV06apastgcu:7674: abhyantaraṃ ca bahirārabhya madhye yathā samāpyate tathetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7675: tatra madyasthūṇāsu vaṃśadhāraṇārthāsu pradakṣiṇamiticābhyantaramiti ca viśeṣaṇasyāsambhavāt paryantāsveva bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7676: tatra prāgdvāre 'gāre dakṣiṇadvārasthūṇāgartamārabhya pradakṣiṇamottarasmāt dvārasthūṇāgartāt khānayitvā tato yāvatyo madhyamamasthūṇāḥ tāvatīnāṃ dakṣiṇādārabhyodagapavargaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7678: evaṃkhānayitvā gartebhyaḥ pāsūnudūpya uddhatya tatauttarābhyāṃ ṛgbhyāṃ 'ihaiva tiṣṭhe'tyetābhyāṃ dakṣiṇādvārasthūṇāṃ garte avadadhāti //3//
GV06apastgcu:7681: kḷptamudūhena prāgudakpravaṇaṃ kṛtaṃuttarayā'syonā pṛthivi'ityanayābhimṛśya sthūṇāgartānsthūṇānāṃ vibhāgārthān gartān karmakaraiḥ pradakṣiṇaṃkhānayitvābhyantaramārabhya,
GV06apastgcu:7686: atra prādakṣiṇyasya cābhyantaratvasya ca vidhānaṃ pa4yantīyāsveva sthūṇāsu;
GV06apastgcu:7703: itarāsaṃ tuyathākhātaṃ yena krameṇa gartāḥ khātāḥ tenāvadhānaṃ tūṣṇīm /
GV06apastgcu:7705: tairādhīyamānaṃ vaṃśamuttareṇa yajuṣā ' ṛtena sthūṇā” vityanenābhimantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:7713: yathākhātaṃ khananakrameṇaitarāḥsthūṇāḥ tūṣṇīmanvavadhāyavaṃśaṃ samatūpaṃ samathūṇāsvādhīyamānaṃuttareṇa yajuṣā'ṛtena sthūṇā vadhiroha';
GV06apastgcu:7721: yathāliṅgamitiyasyāgārāṅgasya liṅgaṃ yasmin mantre dṛśyate tena tadabhimukho 'gāramabhimantrayata ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7722: yadāpi pūrvasthūṇā baddhā tadāpi dve evābhisandhāyābhimantraṇam /
GV06apastgcu:7724: evaṃ sarvatra agāramadhye yaḥ sthūṇārājaḥ stūpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7725: pṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ atraike sthūṇāliṅgeṣu caturṣu mantreṣu 'sthūṇe abhirakṣatu'ityevamanuṣaṅgāmcchanti /
GV06apastgcu:7726: yajñaśca dakṣiṇāśca dakṣiṇe sthūṇe abhirakṣatu iti /
GV06apastgcu:7730: ūhasya cāvidhānāt abhyātānavat pāṭhābhāvacca sarvānuṣaṅgeṣu dṛṣṭasyānte punaḥ pāṭhasyābhāvācca /
GV06apastgcu:7731: yattu sākāṃkṣatvamuktaṃ tadapi nānuṣaṅgahetuḥ sannidhimātreṇākāṅkṣāyā nivartanāt /
GV06apastgcu:7732: yadi vā dharmaste sthūṇārāja śrīste ityatrābhirakṣatvityasya nāpekṣā ,
GV06apastgcu:7739: sammitaṃnirmitamagāraṃuttarāḥ'brahma ca te kṣatraṃ ca'ityādibhiḥ pañcabhirmantraiḥyathāliṅgaṃmantraliṅgāvagatadiṅmukho 'bhimantrayate tatra pañcamena madhyamābhimukhaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:7746: atra kecit-dvitīyādiṣu triṣu mantreṣu vākyasamāptyartha 'sthūṇe abhirakṣatu'ityādyanuṅgaṃ manyante /
GV06apastgcu:7758: pālāśaṃ śamīmayaṃ vedhmamādīpyottarayāgnimuddhṛtyottareṇa yajuṣāgāraṃ prapādyottarapūrvadeśe 'gārasyottarayāgniṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati // ĀpGs_17.7 //
GV06apastgcu:7775: yeṣāṃ tūdagayanāpekṣā te rātrau praveśaṃ necchanti /
GV06apastgcu:7776: ahaḥkṛtasya rātrikṛtasya ca pāpmano viniyogaḥ prapādyata ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7779: tamuddhṛtamagniṃ uttareṇa yajuṣā 'indra sya gṛhā vasumanto varūthinaḥ'ityanenaagāraṃprapādayati /
GV06apastgcu:7795: homasaṃyogāt . athaupāsanasya vaihārikāṇāṃ ca tadaiva praveśanaṃ pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca sve sthāne /
GV06apastgcu:7800: idhmamiti ca 'agniṣu mahata idhmānādadhāti'itivadaniyataṃ saṃkhyādikaṃ vivakṣitam /
GV06apastgcu:7803: atra ca sānuṣaṅge catuṣpade triṣṭubhau dve ṛcau pañcabhiḥ pādairāmnāte /
GV06apastgcu:7813: tathā śrautāgnīnapi vidhivadānītānasminneva kāle agāraṃ prapādyāgnyagāre yathāvidhi pratiṣṭhāpayati /
GV06apastgcu:7814: kecit-ihāgnimuddhṛtya agāraṃ prapādyeti prakṛte 'pi punaruktayoretayorarthavattvāya agārasyāgnimityanvayādādīpanādipratiṣṭhāpanāntaṃ pacanārtha sya laukikāgnereva,
GV06apastgcu:7816: teṣāmetattulyasūtre vivāhāṅge praviśya home pacanāgnerevopasamādhānādi syāt /
GV06apastgcu:7817: athāgāraśabdasya śayanasthānavācitvāt gṛhaśabdasya cātathātvāt na tatra tulyasūtrateti cet-na;
GV06apastgcu:7834: udakaṃ dhīyate yatra tat udadhānaṃ maṇikākhyam /
GV06apastgcu:7839: tasminviṣūcīnāgrāndarbhānsaṃstīrya teṣūttarayā vrīhiyavān nyupya tatrodadhānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati // ĀpGs_17.9 //
GV06apastgcu:7855: tatra caturbhirvā kumbhaiḥ pṛthagānayanamekenaiva vātha punaḥ pūrayitvā,
GV06apastgcu:7859: tasmin udadhāne uttareṇa'ariṣṭā asmākaṃ'ityanenayajuṣā catura udakumbhānānayati /
GV06apastgcu:7869: atha yadi tadudadhānāṃ bhidyate tatuttarayarcā bhūmirbhūmi'mityetayāanumantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:7876: agnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte uttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate // ĀpGs_17.12 //
GV06apastgcu:7887: agniniyamārta tu-yo 'gāre pacanārtha pratiṣṭhāpito 'gniḥ tasyaiva homārthamupasamādhānaṃ yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:7888: anyathā sarvapākayajñārthe aupāsana eva homaḥ syāt /
GV06apastgcu:7894: utyate-sviṣṭakṛtpratiṣedhastāvat gamyate-uttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate na sviṣṭakṛtpratiṣedhastāvat gamyate-uttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate na sviṣṭakṛtamiti /
GV06apastgcu:7905: itivadājyabhāgānta ityanenaiva tantraprāptau siddhāyāṃ 'agnerupasamādhānādi'iti vacanaṃ svamatena pratiṣṭhitaḥ pacanāgnireveha homārtha ityevamarthamiti /
GV06apastgcu:7913: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvottareṇa yajuṣodakumbhena triḥ pradakṣiṇamantarato 'gāraṃ niveśanaṃ vā pariṣicya brāhmaṇān bhojayedapūpaissaktubhirodaneneti // ĀpGs_17.13 //
GV06apastgcu:7922: paribhāṣayaiva siddhe pradakṣiṇamiti vacanāt pariṣecanamidamekameva pradakṣiṇaṃ triguṇībhūtaṃ sakṛdupāttenaivodakumbhena saṃtatamavicchinnaṃ kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:7923: mekhalayā parivyāṇavat trīṇi pariṣecananīti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7924: antaraṃtaiti vacanamagārāt bahiḥ pariṣecanaṃ mā bhūt /
GV06apastgcu:7933: pariṣecanāntamuttareṇa'śivaṃ śivam'ityanenayajuṣāudakumbhena sakṛdupāttenaagāraṃ niveśanaṃ vāntarato na bahiḥtriḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ pariṣicya brāhmaṇān bhojayedapūpādibhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7942_0: śvagrahahītaṃ kumāraṃ tapoyukto jālena pracchādya kaṃsaṃ kiṅkiṇiṃ vā hrādayannadvāreṇa
GV06apastgcu:7953: yāvatā tapasā siddhaṃ manyate tāvat kṛtvetyarthaḥjālaṃmatsyagrahaṇaṃ tenapracchādya /
GV06apastgcu:7956: tayoranyataraṃ hrādayan anyatarasya dhvaniṃ kārayan kenacidanyena /
GV06apastgcu:7957: svayaṃ kumāraṃ gṛhītvāsamāṃ prapādayati advāreṇachadīrapohyamārga kṛtvā tenetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7959: sabhā, tasyā madhye 'dhidevanaṃ sthānaṃyatra kitavā dīvyanti taṃ pradeśaṃuddhatyādbhiravokṣyatatrākṣānnivapati /
GV06apastgcu:7964: tato dadhnā lavaṇamiśreṇāvokṣedañja- linā uttarairmantraiḥ 'kūrkurassukūrkura'ityādibhiḥ 'śvānamicchvādanna puruṣaṃ chat'ityantaiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7971: yāvat karma samāpyate tāvat saṃsakiṅkaṇyoranyatarasya hrādanam /
GV06apastgcu:7988: tasmin pakṣe āditastisra ṛcaḥ tataḥ 'tatsatyaṃ yattvendraḥ'vigṛhya bāhū iti dve yajuṣā tato 'bibhranniṣkam'iti pañcarcaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8001: yadi bhaiṣajyena kumāro 'gadaḥ syāt na tatredaṃ kartavyamiti /
GV06apastgcu:8002_0: anyathā kumāra syāsmin roge piturnaimittikamidamavaśyaṃ kartavyaṃ vijñāyeta gṛhadāheṣṭyādivat
GV06apastgcu:8002_1: . evaṃ bruvatāṃ doṣaḥ yakṣmagṛhītāmanyāṃ vetyetatprakārāntareṇa rogaśāntāvapi kartavyaṃ
GV06apastgcu:8003: evametasmin karmaṇi triṣu kāseṣu kṛte kumāro 'gado bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8004: yadi na bhavati punarapi tapoyuktena kartavyamiti //2//
GV06apastgcu:8008: sarvatra śrutitor'thato vāvagatasya kāminaḥ karmopadeśaḥ sāmarthyātphalasiddhyavagamaparyanta iti pradarśayitum /
GV06apastgcu:8013: yadi na bhavati tadā punarapyetatkarma kartavyaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:8016: śaṅkhinaṃ kumāraṃ tapoyukta uttarābhyāmabhimantryottarayodakumbhena śirasto 'vanayetprātarmadhyandine sāyam // ĀpGs_18.3 //
GV06apastgcu:8022: tena gṛhītaṃśaṅkhinamuttarābhyāṃete te pratidvaśyete ityetāmyāmṛgbhyāṃabhimantrya tata udakuṃbhenaśirasto 'vanayet,
GV06apastgcu:8027: śahkho 'pi grahaḥ yena gṛhītaḥ śaṅkhavannadati tadgṛhītaśśaṅkhī /
GV06apastgcu:8045: atha sarpavalirnāma karma nityaṃ saṃvatsare saṃvatsare kartavyamupadiśyatetasya śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāmārambhaḥ
GV06apastgcu:8047: tasyopakrame śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ astamite āditye sthālīpākobhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8048: asatyapi nakṣatrayoge śrāvaṇasya māsasya paurṇamāsī śrāvaṇītyucyate lakṣaṇayā /
GV06apastgcu:8049: tatra ślokaumeṣādisthe savitari yoyo darśaḥ pravartate /
GV06apastgcu:8051: teṣu yā yā paurṇamāsī sā sā caitryādikā smṛtā /
GV06apastgcu:8054: tatra sāyamāhutiṃ hutvā sthālīpākakarma pratipadyate pārvaṇenāto 'nyānītyuktaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:8056_0: śrāvaṇyai paurṇamāsyai saṅkalpitān vrīhin yavān vā nirupya pratiṣṭhitābhidhāraṇāntaṃ
GV06apastgcu:8056_1: kṛtvāgnerupasamādhānādi dvandvaṃ nyañci pātrāṇi kiṃśukapuṣpairāragvadhamayasamidbhiśca saha //5 //
GV06apastgcu:8071: teṣu yā yā paurṇamāsī sā sā caitryādikā smatā /
GV06apastgcu:8079: pārvaṇavadājyabhāgānte sthālīpākāddhutvāñjalinottaraiḥ pratimantraṃ kiṃśukāni juhoti // ĀpGs_18.6 //
GV06apastgcu:8095: pratimantramittyucyate pratimantraṃ kiṃśukānāṃ bahutvaṃ yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:8102: śthālīpākādvidhivadavadāya 'śrāvaṇyai paurmamāsyai svāhā'iti hutvā 'jagdho maśakaḥ'ityādibhistribhiḥuttaraiḥ pratimantraṃ kiṃśukāni palāśasya puṣpāṇi juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:8107: añjalerapi darvyā saha lepāñjanaṃ ca bhavatyeva;
GV06apastgcu:8128: tenātra samidhāṃ māntravarṇikadevatoddeśena tyāgaḥ kartavya eva //7//
GV06apastgcu:8144: evametā ekādaśa pradhānāhutīrhutvā sauviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca sthālīpākādeva hutvā tato jayādi pratipadyate kiṃśukaprabhṛtīnāmapyāhutīnāṃ prādhānyajñāpanārthamidaṃ nacanam /
GV06apastgcu:8145: anyathā paurṇamāsyāmastamite sthālīpāka iti vihitatvāt paurmamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsīti ca tasya devatābhidhānādarśakarmakatvācca kiṃśukānāṃ pradhānatvaṃ na gamyeta /
GV06apastgcu:8146: tataśca pārṇavadupahomāntaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ kiṃśukādīnāṃ hemaḥ prāpnoti //9//
GV06apastgcu:8152: 5 gṛhādīśānyāṃ diśi sthaṇḍilaṃ kalpayitvā tatra saktunivāpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8153_0: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvā vāgyatassaṃbhārānādāya prācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramya sthaṇḍilaṃ
GV06apastgcu:8153_1: kalpayitvā tatra prācīrudīcīśca tistrastistro lekhā likhitvādbhirupaninīya tāsūttarayā
GV06apastgcu:8158: pariṣecanānte upaniṣkramaṇameva nānditi kiṃ siddhaṃ bhavati ?
GV06apastgcu:8160: vāgyataḥśabdamakurvandhānāḥ lājāḥ a#janābhyañjane sthagarośīramu- dapātramiti saṃbhārāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8162: kalpayitveti vacanāt svayameva kalpanaṃ nānyaiḥ kalpitasya parigrahaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8163: tatreti vacanāt sthaṇḍilasya madhye balerāyatanaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8173: evaṃ lokhā likhitvādbhirupaninayati tāsāṃ samīpe apo ninayati sarvadevajanebhyo dadāti yathāpitṛbhyaḥ piṇḍadāne /
GV06apastgcu:8174: tatastāsu lekhāsūttarayarcā 'namo 'stu sarpebhyo ye pārthivā'ityetayā saktūnnivapati hastena darvyā vā,
GV06apastgcu:8176: tāsviti vacanaṃ tāḥ sarvā lekhāḥ yathā balirvyāpnuyādityevamartham //10//
GV06apastgcu:8182_0: sthaṇaḍilaṃ pīṭhaṃ kalpayitvā tatra pīṭhe dakṣiṇasyā ārabhyaprācīstisraḥpratīcyā
GV06apastgcu:8182_1: ārabhyaudīcīstisraśca rekhā likhitvādbhirupaninīya tāsu ṣacisu lekhāsu lekhanakpameṇottarayā
GV06apastgcu:8187: kecit-sarvāsu rekhāsu yathā yugapatyāpnuyādvaliḥ tathā nivapati //10//
GV06apastgcu:8189: tūṣṇī sampuṣkā dhānā lājānāñjanābhyañjane sthagarośīramiti // ĀpGs_18.11 //
GV06apastgcu:8193: saṃpuṣkāakṣatā akhaṇḍitāstaṇḍulaiḥ kṛtāḥ sthagarañcośīrañca gandhadravye etāni ṣaṭ dravyāṇi tāsu nivapati /
GV06apastgcu:8194: iti śabdaḥ samuccayārthaḥ tena sarvatra pūrveṇa mantreṇaiva nivapane prāpte tūṣṇīmiti mantrapratiṣdhaḥ //11//
GV06apastgcu:8202: etāni ṣaṭ dravyāṇi tūṣṇī rekhasveva nivapati //11//
GV06apastgcu:8204: uttarairupasthāyāpaḥ pariṣicyāpratīkṣastūṣṇīmetyā paśveta padetyetābhyāmudakumbhena triḥ pradakṣiṇamantarato 'gāraṃ niveśanaṃ vā pariṣicya brāhmaṇān bhojayet // ĀpGs_18.12 //
GV06apastgcu:8211: tebhya imaṃ balimahārṣamiti pūrvasyā evottarasya pādasya sannāmaḥ na mantrāntaram /
GV06apastgcu:8216: pratyetya 'apaśveta padā'ityetābhyāṃ ṛgbhyāṃ udakuṃbhena untarato 'gāraṃ niveśanaṃ vāpariṣicyabrahmaṇān yugamān bhojayet sthālīpākaśṣādibhiḥ //12//
GV06apastgcu:8222: ityādiṣu caturṣu paryāyeṣu daśabhyaḥ padebhya ūrdhva 'rakṣitā yaścādhipatiḥ'ityāderanuṣaṅgaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8223: tathā 'hetayo nāma stha'ityādiṣvapi pañcasvekādaśabhya urdhva 'vātanāmaṃ tebhyo vo namaḥ'iti ādeḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8224: yattumadhye-tebhya imaṃbalimahārṣamiti tatpūrvasyā eva baliharaṇārthāyā ṛcaḥ
GV06apastgcu:8227: atha nyaptaṃ balimadbhiḥ pariṣicya tamapratīkṣamāṇaḥ tūṣṇīṃ vāgyato gṛhānpratyetya 'apa śveta padā'ityetābhyāmityādi yathāsūtraṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:8240: evamata ūrdhva yadaśanīyasya saktūnāṃ vaitaṃ baliṃ haredāmārgaśīrṣyāḥ // ĀpGs_19.2 //
GV06apastgcu:8251: tadasmāt karmaṇaūrdhvamāmārgaśīrṣyāḥ parvaṇaścaturṣu māseṣu yadasīyasyānnaviśeṣasyasaktūnāṃ vāharahaḥkartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:8256: tūṣṇīṃ saṃpuṣkāḥ dhānā“ityādi sarveṣāṃ tulyā cedanā /
GV06apastgcu:8257: mantre ca tulyavadabhidhānaṃ tebhya imaṃ baliṃ hariṣyāmi iti /
GV06apastgcu:8269: yadi hyevaśabda ubhayārthassyāt rātrau pārvaṇaḥ prāpnoti /
GV06apastgcu:8271: tathā yadyetacchabda ubhayārthassyāt “parisaṃvatsarādupatiṣṭhadbhyaḥ etatkārya“miti rātrāvapacitiḥ prāpnoti;
GV06apastgcu:8276: katham?yadaśanīyasyeti vacanāt yadaśanīyasyeti vacanāt yadyadannamaśanārtha yadā kriyate tasya tasya tadā kartavyamiti hi tasyārthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8279: tataśca yadā gṛhamedhino yadaśanīyasya homā balayaścettyutpannasya vaiśvadevasya dvayoḥ kālayoḥ pravṛttiḥ evamasyāpi /
GV06apastgcu:8280: spaṣṭañcaitadāśvalāyanake“sarpadevajenabhyassvā- heti sāyaṃ prātarbaliṃ haredā pratyavarohaṇāt (āśva.2-1-14) iti /
GV06apastgcu:8282: ata ūrdhvamitivacanama- smin prathame baliharaṇe dravyavikalpomā vijñāyīti /
GV06apastgcu:8295: yadaśanīyasya vā sambandhinamiti vāśabdasya vyavahitena sambandhaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:8297: agārapariṣecanādikaṃ tu sthālīpākasyaiva śeṣo na baliharaṇasya,
GV06apastgcu:8304: tathā etamitiśabdasyaiva apekṣitakṛtsnadharmaprāpakatvāt evamiti śabda uttarasūtrārtha iti /
GV06apastgcu:8312: yathedaṃ śrāvaṇyāṃ karma kataṃ evaṃ mārgaśīrṣyāmapīti /
GV06apastgcu:8313: tena 'pārvaṇavadājyabhāgānta'ityādeḥ dhānāḥ kumārān prāśayantī'tyantasya kṛtsnasya kalpasyātra pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8315: śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ iti prakṛte punaḥ paurṇamāsyāmityucyate jñāpanārtham
GV06apastgcu:8317: tena pūrvasūtre āmārgaśīrṣyā iti karmāvadhitvena na gṛhyate /
GV06apastgcu:8319: tena mārgaśīrṣyā paurṇamāsyāmahani yadaśanīyasya baliharaṇaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8320: kālavācitve tu na prāpnoti yadi ca maryādāyāmākāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8323: iṣyate cāstamite sthālīpākakarmaṇi saptarbhirdravyairba- liharaṇamahani ca yadaśanīyasya /
GV06apastgcu:8325: kālasya vyapadeśo mā bhūditi paurṇamāsyāmiti viśeṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:8326: evañca yadaśanīyavacanenobhayoḥ kālayorbaliharaṇamiti yaduktaṃ tadeva sthitaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8333: patnyavahantītyādi dhānāprāśanāntaṃ kṛtsnaṃ karmānuṣṭheyamityarthaḥ . sthālīpākahome tu'mārgaśīrṣyaipaurṇamāsyai svāhe'ti viśeṣaḥ //3//
GV06apastgcu:8338: yadyapyayaṃ sannāmastasminneva mantre paṭhitaḥ tathāpyasatyasmin vacane baliharaṇamantre caturthapādasya pṛthagviniyogābhāvāt catuṣpādā sā vijñāyeta /
GV06apastgcu:8340: tripadaiva sā tasyā eva tṛtīyasya pādasya sannāmo 'yamuttamaḥ paṭhitaḥ tasyaiva viniyogakālo na prāgiti /
GV06apastgcu:8341: kiñca kṛtsnamevaitat karma dhānāprāśanāntaṃ sthālīpākaśabdena gṛhyate etacca darśitaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8352: evamityanena vacanena śrāvaṇīvidhānasya kṛtsnasyātidiṣṭatvādasyāpi sthālīpākasya śeṣatvena baliharaṇaprāptiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8370: tat karma vakṣyate-tatra anāhitāgnigrahaṇamāhitāgneraupāsanavataḥ śrautenāgrayaṇena saha samuccayapratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:8391: sarvādhīnino 'pi māsiśrāddhaṃ homavarja kartavyameva upadśamataṃ tu-saśeṣādhāninaścāhitāgne /
GV06apastgcu:8396: yena karmaṇā agre navadravyaṃ devān prāpayatīti /
GV06apastgcu:8401_0: navānāṃ sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā'grayaṇadevatābhyaḥ sviṣṭakṛccaturthābhyo hutvā taṇḍulānāṃ
GV06apastgcu:8401_1: mukhaṃ pūrayitvā gīrtvā'camyaudanapiṇḍaṃ saṃvṛttyottareṇa yajuṣāgārastūpa udviddhet // ĀpGs_19.7 //
GV06apastgcu:8405_0: navānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ yavānāṃ vā aupāsane śrapayitvā pratiṣṭhitamabhighāryāgnimupasamādhāya
GV06apastgcu:8405_1: saṃparistīya tūṣṇīṃ samantaṃ pariṣicya durvī saṃmṛcya sthālīpākādupaghātaṃ catasra
GV06apastgcu:8419: tān gīrtvā bhakṣayitvā'camya tata odanapiṇḍaṃ saṃvartayāti prayatnena sampādayati /
GV06apastgcu:8420: yathā stūpe udvidhyamāno na saṃśīryati tathā saṃvartya tamagārastūpe udvidhyet-uttareṇa yajuṣā'parameṣṭhyasī'tyanena ūrdhva vidhyet
GV06apastgcu:8425: āgrayaṇavacanādeva siddhe navānāmiti vacanamanāhitāgnernavānāṃ sthālīpāka eva yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:8428: tena śyāmākānāṃ veṇukānāṃ veṇuyavānāṃ cāgrayaṇaṃ anāhitāgnerbhavati //7//
GV06apastgcu:8431: navānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ yavānāṃ vā sambandhināṃ patnyavahantītyādividhināsthālīpākamevaśrapayitvāgnerupasamādhānādyagnimukhānte kṛte
GV06apastgcu:8433: tatra prathamamindrāgnibhyāṃ agnīndrābhyāṃ vā svāheti juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:8445: 'āgrayaṇaṃ bhavati hutādyāya'ityatrendrāgnyādadīnāmevopadeśāt aindrāgnasya mukhyapradhānatve cāmāvāsyātantramiti tantrani- yamasyopapatteḥ,
GV06apastgcu:8447: atra ca sviṣṭakṛccaturthābhya iti vacanaṃ śrautavadiha vrīhyāgrayaṇena śyāmākāgrayaṇasya pākṣikī samānatantratā mā bhūdityāvamartham /
GV06apastgcu:8453: kecit-sviṣṭakṛccaturthavacanāhitāgneḥ syāmākādīnāṃ veṇuyavānāṃ cāgrayaṇameva na bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:8467: tata odanena hutaśeṣeṇa piṇḍaṃ saṃvartayati yathā udvidyamāno na śīryati tathā sudṛḍhaṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:8468: tatastaṃ piṇḍamuttareṇa yajuṣā 'parameṣṭhyasi'ityanena udviddhet ūrdhva vikṣipet /
GV06apastgcu:8474: uttareṇa yajuṣā pratyavaruhyottarairdakṣiṇaiḥ pārśvaiḥ navasvastare saṃviśanti // ĀpGs_19.9 //
GV06apastgcu:8478: hemantapratyavarohaṇaṃ nāma karma nityaṃ saṃvatsare saṃvatsare kartavyam,
GV06apastgcu:8479: tadupadiśyate-hemante prāpte khaṭvāṃ vihāya palāśasvastare śete /
GV06apastgcu:8485: (apara āha-mārgaśīrṣyā paurṇamāsyāmastamite sthālīpākānte pratyavarohaṇaṃ sarvaṣāṃ prasiddhatvāditi /
GV06apastgcu:8487_1: palāśaiḥ kaspite śayanīye dakṣiṇaiḥ pārśvaiḥdakṣiṇāni pārśvānyadhaḥ kṛtvāsaṃviśantiśerate /
GV06apastgcu:8489: nityaseyaiva saṃveśanasya niyama- vidhirayam-niśāyāṃ yatsaṃveśanaṃ saṃvapnārtha tadasyāṃ niśāyāmeva kartavyamiti /
GV06apastgcu:8493: yasmin karmāṇi hemante svaṣṭvātaḥ pratyavarohaṇaṃ taddhemantapratyavarohaṇaṃ nāma karmopadiśyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8494: asmādeva ca yaugikānnāmadheyāt 'pratyavarūḍo no hemantaḥ'iti mantraliṅgāccedaṃ karma hemante prathamāyāṃ rātrau kartavyamiti vidhiḥ kalpyate /
GV06apastgcu:8497_0: uttareṇa yajuṣā 'pratyavarūḍho no hemantaḥ'ityanena gṛhasthaḥ patnyādayaśca navasvastare
GV06apastgcu:8497_1: āruhya svaṣṭvāto hemante pratyavarohanti yāvaddhemantastāvatkhaṣṭvāṃ śayyāṃ vimucya
GV06apastgcu:8498: na punaḥ pūrvamadṛṣṭārtha khaṣṭvāmāruhya mantreṇa svastaraṃ pratyavarohantīti /
GV06apastgcu:8500: navasvastare navaiḥ palāśaiḥ kalpite śayanīye dakṣiṇaiḥ pārśvaiḥ
GV06apastgcu:8504: dakṣiṇataḥ pitottarā mātaivamavaśiṣṭānāṃ jyeṣṭho jyeṣṭho 'nantaraḥ // ĀpGs_19.10 //
GV06apastgcu:8508: teṣāṃ saṃviśatāṃ yaḥ pitā sa dakṣiṇaśśete yā mātā sottarā /
GV06apastgcu:8512: avaśiṣṭā amātyāsteṣāṃ yo yo jyeṣṭaḥ kumāraḥ kumārī vā sa piturdakṣiṇataḥ tadanantaro māturuttarataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8513: tṛtīyaḥ prathamasya dakṣiṇataḥ caturtho dvitīyasyottarata ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:8515: sarve prākśrasaḥ udaṅmukhāḥ mantravidaśca mantrān japeyuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8520: avaśiṣṭānāṃputrādīnāṃ madhye yo yo jyeṣṭhaḥ putro duhitā vā sa sa dakṣiṇo 'nantaraśca,
GV06apastgcu:8521: yo yaḥ kanīyān sa sa uttaro 'nantaraśca;
GV06apastgcu:8524: yo dvitīyo jyeṣṭhassa sarvajyeṣṭhasya uttaro 'nantara ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:8531: evaṃ saṃviśya kiñcit suptvā saṃhāya sampūrvo jahatiḥ śayanāduttthāyāsane dṛṣṭaḥ 'kaliśśayāno bhavati saṃjihānastu dvāpara“iti /
GV06apastgcu:8540: evaṃ saṃveśanaṃ saṃhāyābhimarśanaṃ ca mantravat trirāvartanīyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8542: “udita āditye sauryāṇi svastyayanāni ca japitvānnaṃ saṃskṛtya brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā svastyayanaṃ vācayitve“(āśva.gṛ.4-6-18)
GV06apastgcu:8552: kiṃ tarhi?yadeva rāgaprāptaṃ rātrau saṃveśanaṃ tadāśratya mantrā niyamāśca vidhīyante;
GV06apastgcu:8554: yathā vā 'payasvatīroṣadhayaḥ iti purā barhiṣa āhartorjāyāpatī aśnītaḥ '(āpa.śrau.4-2-3) ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:8558: atheśānabalirnāma nityaḥ pākayajño mantrāmnānakramaprāpto vyākhyāyate tasya ca sāmānyavidhisiddhodagayanādireva kālaḥ;
GV06apastgcu:8563: tathā śāstrāntarādeva gavāṃ śāntyarthaḥ putrādikāmārthaśca prayogaḥ pratyetavya iti /
GV06apastgcu:8567: īśānāya sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā kṣaitrapatyaṃ ca prācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramya sthaṇḍilaṃ kalpayitvāgnerupasamādhānādi // ĀpGs_19.13 //
GV06apastgcu:8571: atha īśānabalirnāma pākayajño vakṣyate śūlagava iti yasya prasiddhiḥ gavālambhanaṃ ca tatra śāstrāntare
GV06apastgcu:8574: nityaścāyaṃ puruṣasaṃ skāraḥ na kāmyonaimittiko vā /
GV06apastgcu:8585: tena yakṣyamāṇo gṛhe sthālīpākaṃ śrapayati aupāsane īśānāyadevāya saṅkalpitamekaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:8587_0: taissahaprācīmudīcīṃ vā diśaṃ grāmāt bahirupaniṣkramyayatra yakṣyamāṇo bhavati tatra
GV06apastgcu:8587_1: devayajanāya devagṛhayośca paryāptamekaṃ sthaṇḍilaṃ kalpayitvātasya pūrvārdhe aganyāyatanamullikhyāgniṃ
GV06apastgcu:8592: īśa aiśvarye“iti dhātvathesmṛteḥ niratiśayamaiśvarya yasya saīśānaḥpraṇavopāsanādibhirupāsyo maheśvara ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8593: tasmai īśānāya sthālīpākaṃhomādibhyaḥ paryāptaṃ pārvaṇavadaupāsane śrapayitvā,
GV06apastgcu:8595: kecit-trīnodānān kalpayitvāgnimabhyānīya tato bahiḥ pratiṣṭhāpya trayāṇāmabhighāraṇamiti /
GV06apastgcu:8598: atha yathārtha sambhārānādāya grāmātprācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramyāgnikuṭyādibhyo 'laṃsthaṇḍilādi kalpayitvā,
GV06apastgcu:8608: tata agneḥ paścāt dve kuṭī karoti devāya devyai ca /
GV06apastgcu:8615: agnimukhānte kṛte apareṇāgniṃ dve kuṭī prāgdvāro udagaparge kṛtvā //14//
GV06apastgcu:8623: madhye jayaṃtasya pratikṛtimākāśa eva kṛtvā dakṣimasyāmīśānamāvāhayati uttarayarcā 'ā tvā vahanti'tyetayā /
GV06apastgcu:8624: agnerupasamādhānādīttyuktatvāt pradhānāhutīnāṃ ca vakṣyamāṇatvāt ājyabhāgānte kuṭīkaraṇameva bhavati //1//
GV06apastgcu:8635: uttarasyāṃ laukikyā vācā mīḍhuṣīṃ devīṃ āvāhayati /
GV06apastgcu:8643: tathottarasyāṃ kuṭyāṃlaukikyā vācā 'āyāhi mīḍhuṣi'iti mīḍhuṣīmīśānasya patnīṃ āvāhayatītyeva jaya karmāṇamindraṃ //2//
GV06apastgcu:8644: kuṭyormadhye ākāśe jayantamindrasūnuṃ skandaṃ vā 'āyāhi jayanta'ityāvāhayati /
GV06apastgcu:8649: yathoḍhamudakāni pradāya trīnodanān kalpayitvāgnimabhyānīyottaraikupasparśayitvā uttarairyathāsvamodanebhyo hutvā sarvatassamavadāyottareṇa yajuṣāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtam // ĀpGs_20.4 //
GV06apastgcu:8653: (yena śabdena yeṣu sthāneṣu yena krameṇāvāhanaṃ coditaṃ taddevatākānyardhyāṇi prayacchati) /
GV06apastgcu:8657: tato gandhapuṣpaghūpadīpairabhyarcya tataḥ sthālīpākāduddhṛtya trīnodanān kalpayati triṣu pātreṣu devyai skandāya ca devāya homārtha upahārārtha ca /
GV06apastgcu:8659: tatastānodanānagnisamīpamānīyyāpageṇāgniṃ barhiṣi pratiṣṭhāpayati dakṣiṇata uttaratomadhye ca /
GV06apastgcu:8666: yenaudanena yasyai devatāyai tvatvasambandha upasparśanenopalakṣitaḥ tasmāt tasya juhotītyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8670: evaṃ pradhānāhutīrhutvā tatassarvataḥ samavādāyottareṇa yajuṣāva 'agnaye sviṣṭakṛte suhuta'ityanenāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃyajati /
GV06apastgcu:8671: sarvatassamava- dāyettyucyate yathā svamodanebhyaḥ pṛthakpṛthak sviṣṭakṛnmābhūditi /
GV06apastgcu:8689: ityādibhissaptadaśabhiḥyathāsvamodanebhyaḥyo ya odano yasyā yasyā devatāyāssvabhūtastasmāttasmādyathāliṅgaṃ pārvaṇavadānadharmeṇāvadā- ya pradhānāhutīrjuhoti /
GV06apastgcu:8694: tatassarvatassarvebhyastribhya odanebhyaḥ sviṣṭakṛto 'vadānadharmeṇasamavadāya sahvadāyauttareṇa yajuṣā'agnaye sviṣṭakṛte suhuta huta'ityanenāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃjuhoti /
GV06apastgcu:8695: ataḥsarvatassamavadāyeti vacanaṃ āgrayaṇamāsiśrāddhādivat sakṛdevāvadāya sviṣṭakṛditi śahkānirāsārtham //4//
GV06apastgcu:8697: uttareṇa yajuṣopasthāyottaraissahaudanāni parṇānyekaikena dve dve datvā daśa devasenābhyo daśottarābhyaḥ // ĀpGs_20.5 //
GV06apastgcu:8701: uttareṇa yajuṣā'svastinaḥ pūrṇamukha'ityanena upasthānaṃ ca mahādevasya,
GV06apastgcu:8708: tatra cāditassaptabhiḥ pratimantraṃ dve dve parṇedadāti /
GV06apastgcu:8709: aṣṭamena daśadevasenābhya iti vadan mantrapratītā devatā darśayati /
GV06apastgcu:8710: tatra gṛhapa iti mahādevābhidhānaṃ manyate gṛhān pātīti /
GV06apastgcu:8714: tasmādanena mantreṇa devyai dātavyaṃ tasyā evaudanāt /
GV06apastgcu:8720: deśottarābhyaḥ “yā ākhyātā” ityasminnuttare mantre pratītā uttarā devatāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8721: tābhyo dhaśa parmāni tenaiva mantreṇa devasyaivaudanāt //4//
GV06apastgcu:8724: uttareṇa yajuṣā'svasti naḥ pūrṇamukha'ityanena agnimīśānaṃ vo pariṣṭhate /
GV06apastgcu:8728: tato yathāsvamodanebhya eva yājñiyeṣuparṇānyuttaraiḥ'gṛhapopaspṛśa'ityādibhissaptabhirdadātīti sāmānyena vidhāya viśinaṣṭiekaikenamantreṇadve dveparṇe iti /
GV06apastgcu:8731: tābhyo daśa parṇāni dakṣiṇasyāṃ kuṭyāṃ devasyaivaudanādavadāya dadāti /
GV06apastgcu:8733: uttarasmin mantre 'yā ākyātā yāścānākhyātā'iti guṇadvayavatyastā uttarā devasenāḥ //5//
GV06apastgcu:8738: pūrvavaduttarairmantraiḥ 'dvārāpospṛśe'tyādibhiḥ caturbhiḥ parmāni deyānipūrvavadekaikena dve dve ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8746: pūrva yathā 'gṛhapopaspṛśa'ityādibhirdakṣiṇettarakuṭyormadhye ca svebhya evaudanebhyo dve dve parṇe pratimantraṃ datte,
GV06apastgcu:8760: tasyāmeva tataḥ punarapi tatraiva 'dvārāpopaspṛśa'iti dve parṇe /
GV06apastgcu:8763: atra yadyapi kecana mantrā avyaktaliṅgakā bahuvacanaliṅgakāśca,
GV06apastgcu:8768: ityatra tu sūtrakāravacanāddevasyeśānasya senā devasenā eva devatāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8770: putrādipūjāyāṃ satyāṃ pitrāderahameva pūjita iti mānasapratyakṣodayāt /
GV06apastgcu:8786: odanapiṇḍaṃ saṃvṛtya parṇapuṭe 'vadhāyottareṇa yajuṣā vṛkṣa āsajati // ĀpGs_20.7 //
GV06apastgcu:8790: atha tasyaivodanāt piṇḍaṃ ubhābyāṃ hastābyāṃsaṃvṛtyadṛḍhaṃ kṛtvā parṇaissyūtaiḥ kṛte puṭe 'vadhāyataṃ śikye
GV06apastgcu:8795: atha homabaliśeṣebhyaḥ tribhyaḥ odanebhya upādāyapiṇḍaṃsaṃvartayati sudṛḍhaṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:8798: tatastaṃ piṇḍaṃ parmapuṭe 'vadhāyottareṇa yajuṣā 'namo niṣaṅgiṇa iṣudhimate'ityetāvataiva mantrasamāmnāyagatena vṛkṣe kasmiścidāsajati śikye
GV06apastgcu:8805: atra asminkāle rudrān 'namaste rudra manyava“ityādīnekādaśānuvākān japet /
GV06apastgcu:8808_0: antatastrayo mantrāḥ 'namorudrebhyo ye pṛthivyāṃ yeṣāmannamiṣavaḥ''namo rudrebhyo
GV06apastgcu:8808_1: ye 'ntarikṣe yeṣāṃ vātaḥ''namo rudrebhyo ye divi yeṣāṃ varṣamiṣavastebhyaḥ'ityādi sarvatrānuṣaṅgaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:8815: ityekādaśānuvākān japet cātussvaryeṇa tatrottamānuvāke 'asmin mahati'ityādiṣvaṣṭasu 'teṣāṃ sahasrayojane'(tai.saṃ.8-5-11)
GV06apastgcu:8817_0: tathā 'namo rudrebhyo ye pṛthivyāṃ yeṣāmannamiṣavastebhyaḥ''namo rudrebhyo ye 'ntarikṣe
GV06apastgcu:8817_1: yeṣāṃ vāta iṣavastebhyaḥ'namo rudrebhyo ye divi yeṣāṃ varṣamiṣavastebhyo daśa prācīrdaśa
GV06apastgcu:8828: abhita etamagniṃ gāssthāpayati yathainā dhūmaḥ prāpnuyāt // ĀpGs_20.10 //
GV06apastgcu:8832: etaṃhūyamānamagnimabhito gāḥātmīyāḥ yathāsthāpayatisthāpane enā gāḥ dhūmaḥ prāpnuyāt /
GV06apastgcu:8849: tatra homa kālavacanaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ tasmin kāle //10//
GV06apastgcu:8851: yadyapyasāvupakrame na tiṣṭhet tathāpi ahgatvāt tasyaivāvokṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:8865: gavāṃ marge 'nagnau kṣetrasya patiṃ yajate // ĀpGs_20.12 //
GV06apastgcu:8871: gavāmapagacchantīnāṃ kasyāścit goḥ pathi yāgavidhānāt agnau prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ //12//
GV06apastgcu:8889: caturṣu saptasu vā parṇeṣu nāmādeśaṃ dadhāti // ĀpGs_20.14 //
GV06apastgcu:8893: āvāhyārghya datvā gandhādibhirabhyarcya sthālīpākamāsādyābhighārya catvāri sapta vā parṇāni devasya samīpe kṛtvā
GV06apastgcu:8895: tatra pūrveṣu parmadānamantreṣu svāhākārāntatvaniyamāt ihāpi kṣetrasya pataye svāheti parṇadānam /
GV06apastgcu:8899: catvāri sapta vā parmāni bhūmau sthāpayitvā teṣu kṣaitrapatyāt sthālīpākādodanamādāyanāmadeśaṃnāma caturthyantamādiśya 'kṣetrasya pataye tvāṃ dadāmi,
GV06apastgcu:8904: atra tu na sahaudanāni parmāni deyāni;
GV06apastgcu:8911: pāko bālastadvat gamanaśīlo 'yaṃ devaḥ tasmācchīghraṃ yajetetyarthaḥ //15//
GV06apastgcu:8914: ayaṃ caudanadānātmako yāgaḥ kṣipramāvāhanānantaramudakameva pradāya kartavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8917: etaduktaṃ bhavati-anityadarsanatvāt kṣetrasya pateḥ śagrimeva balirdeya iti /
GV06apastgcu:8943: kṣaitrapatyaṃ prāśnanti ye sanābhayo bhavanti // ĀpGs_20.18 //
GV06apastgcu:8948: sanābhaya ityeva siddheye bhavanti iti vacanaṃ dauhitrādīnāmapi sambandhināṃ pratigrahārtham //18//
GV06apastgcu:8956: eṣāṃ yajamānakulajātānāṃ yathākuladhrbaḥtathā vā prāśanam-yadi putrāṇāmeva,
GV06apastgcu:8962: ityanākulāyāṃ haradattamiśraviracitāyāṃ gṛhyavṛttau viṃśaḥ khaṇḍaḥ saptamaśca paṭalaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:8965: yadyeṣāmanuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ asapiṇḍakartṛkaprāśanamapi kuladharmastarhi tathā vā syāt //19//
GV06apastgcu:8975: punarapi pākayajñāntaraṃ puruṣatrayasampradānakaṃ tādṛśānāmaṣṭakādīnāṃ prakṛtibhūtaṃ māsiśrāddhasaṃjñikaṃ pitryaṃ karmopadiśyate--
GV06apastgcu:8982: māsiśrāddhaṃnāma pitryaṃ karma māsi māsi kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:8985: niti ca te sarve yathopadeśaṃyathā tatropadiṣṭāḥ tathaiva māsi māsi pratyetavyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8986: yadyapi te viśeṣāḥ tasmādeva vacanāt siddhāḥ tathāpi tasya karmaṇaḥ prayogavidhānamita uttaraṃ kriyata iti jñāpanārthamidaṃ vacanam /
GV06apastgcu:8987: anyathā jñāpayeta śucīn mantravataḥ ityādi kasmin karmaṇi vidhīyata iti /
GV06apastgcu:8990: tena pūrvasmin pakṣe pañcadaśyāmakṛtaśrāddhasyāparasmin pakṣe prathamādiṣu sarvāsu tithiṣu kriyābhavati tattatkā-masya //1//
GV06apastgcu:9001: kecit-yasyāṃ tithau prathamamupakramastasyāmevottare prayoga iti niyamo nāsti;
GV06apastgcu:9002: kunti pūrṇe 'pi māse aparapakṣa eva yathopadeśaṃ tithyantare 'pi nityaḥ kāmyaśca prayoga iti //1//
GV06apastgcu:9018: anādye āmaśrāddhe durbhikṣe vā kule ekamapi bhojaye- dityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9019: yadyapi strībhyo 'pi piṇḍadānaṃ dṛśyate tathāpi brāhmaṇabhojanamiha tabhyo na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:9043: nanu-sāmayācārikeṣveva brahmaṇānāṃ mantravattvaṃ yonigotramantrāsambandhatvaṃ va siddham;
GV06apastgcu:9045: ucyate-nitye māsiśrāddhe gṛhyoktaguṇānapi bhojayet nāvaśyaṃ dharmoktān brahmavidontevāsyasambandhānityevamartham /
GV06apastgcu:9049: tataśca pitrādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ pratyakaṃ trīn pañca vā na punassaptādīn,
GV06apastgcu:9064: aṣṭakāsu ca vṛddhau ca gayāyāṃ ca mṛte 'hani /
GV06apastgcu:9067: iha ca sūtrakārabhāṣyakārābyāmanuktamapi viśvadevārtha yugmānāṃ bhojanaṃ kartavyam 'dvau daive'iti manuyājñavaklyābhyāmuktatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:9076: aṅgabhūtasya tu vaiśvadevasya yadyekaṃ bhojayecchrāddhe daivaṃ tatra kathaṃ bhavet /
GV06apastgcu:9077: annaṃ pātre samuddhṛtya sarvasya prakṛtasya ca //
GV06apastgcu:9092: iti yājñavalkyaviṣṇusmṛtyoḥ viṣṇupurāṇe ca vidhidarśanāt mātāmahaśrāddhamapi nityamevāvagamyate /
GV06apastgcu:9094: ucyate-naiva tatrāpi smṛtyantareṣu pitryavatsarvasyaiva jīvato dvijasyāvaśyaṃ mātāmahaśrāddhamapi niyamena kartavyamiti vidhitsitam /
GV06apastgcu:9098: kasya tarhi niyamena kartavyamiti vidhiriti cet;
GV06apastgcu:9099: yaḥ putrikākṛtāyā āsurādivivāho- ḍhāyā vā putro mātāmahena saha mātussāpiṇḍyaṃ karoti,
GV06apastgcu:9104: atha vā yo dauhitro 'putrasya mātāmahasyākhilārtahārī tasyaitacchrāddhaṃ niyatam /
GV06apastgcu:9114: tasmāt sarvasya dhauhitrasya pitryavat kartavyameveti niyamābhāvatsūtrakārabhāṣyakārau na brūtaḥ // 2 //
GV06apastgcu:9149: atra prathamadvitīyayormantrayoramiṣmā ityasya sthāne viṣṇuśarmaṇa iti caturthyā piturnāmagrahaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:9156: ata eva prakṛtau darśapūrṇamāsayoranekapatnīkasyāpi 'patnī sannahya'ityekavacanenaiva sampraiṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9160: jīvapitrādikastu pitrādeḥ pitrādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ mṛtānāṃ nāmāni gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:9165: tattatpratiyopinirdeśapūrvakaḥ 'pituḥ pitā vṛhktām'pituḥ pitāmaho vṛṅktām'ityādikaḥ prayogaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9173: maivam; pitā yasya tu vṛttassyājjīveccāpi pitāmahaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9177: tataśca vyutkramācceti niṣedhaḥ pākṣika iti niścayādadhikāro 'pi pākṣiko 'vigamyate //3//
GV06apastgcu:9186: atrāhuḥ māsiśrāddhe brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ pradhānakarmatadaṅgamagnau karaṇaṃ piṇḍaśca /
GV06apastgcu:9191: homasya bhojanāṅgatvāt piṇḍapitṛyajñe tu homasya pradhānatvāditi /
GV06apastgcu:9192: anye tu yebhya eva pitā dadhyāt tebhya eva putro 'pītyāhuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9193: apara āha trīṇi śrāddhe pradhānāni-agnau karaṇaṃ bhojanaṃ piṇḍadānamiti tenā 'homāt kṛtvā virame'dityasyāpi vidherayaṃ viṣaya iti
GV06apastgcu:9204: prayogaḥ-pūrvadyurnivedanaṃ sāyaṃ bhojanānantaraṃ śvaḥ śrāddhaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GV06apastgcu:9206: (vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ pūrvedyuḥ sāyaṃ bhojanaṃ na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:9208: athāparedyuḥ prātaḥ dvatīyaṃ nivedanam-adya kriyata iti /
GV06apastgcu:9211: pūrva viśvebhyo devebhyo yajñopavītī yugmān dvau caturo vā 'māsi śrāddhe viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kartavya'iti /
GV06apastgcu:9216: pitṛbhya udaṅmukhāḥ dviguṇabhugneṣu dakṣiṇāgreṣu yuvānaḥ pitre /
GV06apastgcu:9220: śucaudeśe dakṣiṇāpravaṇe śrāddhāgāraṃ sarvataḥ pariśritamudagavādvāraṃ tasya pūrvottare deśe agniraupāsanaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9222: tasya dakṣiṇataḥ udaṅmukhāḥ pitrārthāḥ paścāt prāṅmukhāḥ devārthāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9223: tasminneva sthaṇḍile yathāvakāśaṃ triṣu pātreṣu pitṛbhya udakānyarghyāṇi dakṣiṇāpavargāṇi tilavanti /
GV06apastgcu:9225: tāni puṣpairavakīryadarbheṣu sādayitvā darbhaiḥ pracchādya āsanagatānāṃ barāhmaṇānāṃ hasteṣu
GV06apastgcu:9226: svasmātsvasmāt udapātrāt pātrāntaremāpa ādāya 'visve devā idaṃ vor'ghya';
GV06apastgcu:9231: purastādupariṣṭācca śuddhodakam tato gandhādibhiḥ vāsobhiśca dvijānabhyarcya /
GV06apastgcu:9234: tato brāhmaṇārtha saṃskṛtādannāduddhṛtyāpareṇāgniṃ bahirṣi pratiṣṭhāpyābhighāryāgnerupasamādhānādyajyabhāgānte trayodaśa pradhānāhutīrjuhoti //5//
GV06apastgcu:9245: evaṃ pradhānāhutīrhutvā sauviṣṭakṛtaṃ hutvā jayādi pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:9248: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvā praṇītāśca vimucya tatassarvamannaṃ hoṣyaṃ ca samupanidhāya hutaśeṣaṃ ca tasman utsṛjya tamuttairastribhiḥ abhimṛśet
GV06apastgcu:9254: atha brāhmaṇabhojanārthahaviṣyamahaviṣayaṃ ca sarvamannaṃ uttaraiḥ 'eṣa te tata madhumān'ityetaistribhirmantraiḥ abhimṛśet /
GV06apastgcu:9261: atha vā bhojanapātreṣu kḷptānodanaviśeṣān pratipuruṣaṃ pṛthagabhimṛśet yathāliṅgam /
GV06apastgcu:9262: tatra yāvantaḥ pitrarthe bhojayante tāvatsu prathamasya mantrasyāvṛttiḥ 'evamuttarayoḥ- /
GV06apastgcu:9266: athavā -pitrādyarthebhyo brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pratirūrūṣaṃ bhojanapātreṣu kḷptān prakaspitān bhojayapadārthān ekaikena mantreṇa yathāliṅga mabhimṛśet /
GV06apastgcu:9267: atrāpi pitrāderekaikasya brāhmaṇabahutve yugapadabhimarśanāsambhave ca tattanmantrāvṛttiḥ //7//
GV06apastgcu:9273: uttareṇa yajuṣā 'pṛthivī te pātra'mityanena brāhmaṇaiḥ sparśayitvā bhojayediti śeṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9275: 'maiṣāṃ kṣeṣṭhāḥ'iti bahutvaṃ dṛśyate tathāpi pratipuruṣaṃ mantrāvṛttiḥ uparavamantravat ,
GV06apastgcu:9284: rakṣoghnān pitryān vaiṣṇavyānanyāṃśca pavitrān dharmyān mantrān dharmaśāstra mitihāsapurāṇāṃścābhiśrāvayati /
GV06apastgcu:9285: tatastṛptāni jñātvā madhumatīḥ śrāvayet akṣannamīmadanteti ca /
GV06apastgcu:9286: atha bhūmāvannaṃ vikarati-'ye agnidagdhā ye 'nagnigdhā ye vā jātāḥ kule mama /
GV06apastgcu:9287: bhūmau dattena piṇaḍena tṛptā yāntu parāṃ gati'miti /
GV06apastgcu:9288: athācānteṣu punarapo datvā 'svadita'miti pitrartān vācayati 'rocata'iti vāśvadevārtān /
GV06apastgcu:9289: tato yathāśraddhaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ datvā sarvebhyo 'nnaśeṣebhyaḥ piṇḍārtha prāśanārthañcoddhṛtya śeṣaṃ nivedayot-annaśeṣaiḥ kiṃ kriyatāṃ iti /
GV06apastgcu:9292: śraddhā ca no mā vyapagāt bahudeyaṃ ca no 'stu'; //
GV06apastgcu:9299: tatra sarvakarmaṇāṃ vaiśvadeveṣu pūrva pravṛttiḥ paścāt pitryeṣu /
GV06apastgcu:9308: atra ca mantre yadyapi brāhmaṇānāmiti bahuvacanaṃ tatāpi yugapat sparsāyitumaśakyatvāt pratipūruṣaṃ mantrāvṛttiḥ,
GV06apastgcu:9316_0: bhuktavato 'nuvrajya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dvaidhaṃ dakṣiṇāgrān darbhān saṃstīrya teṣūttarairapo
GV06apastgcu:9316_2: triḥprasavyaṃ pariṣicya nyubjya pātrāṇyuttaraṃ yajuranavānaṃ tryavarārghyamāvartayitvā
GV06apastgcu:9316_3: prokṣyapātrāṇi dvandvamabhyudāhṛtya sarvatassamavadāyottareṇa yajuṣā śeṣasya grāsavarārghya
GV06apastgcu:9320: tatastānbhuktavato 'nuvrajya pradīkṣaṇīkṛtyapratyāvṛtya prācīnāvītī piṇḍapradānadeśe dakṣiṇāgrān darbhān
GV06apastgcu:9331: piṇḍaṃ pūrvavat dadāti piṇḍapitṛyajñe yat piṇḍadānaṃ tadityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9335: evamapo datvā tata uttarairmantraiḥ 'etatte tatāsā'vityādibhisteṣu darbheṣūbhayeṣudakṣiṇāpavargān piṇḍān dadāti yathāliṅgaṃ pitṛbhyaśca mātṛbhyaśca /
GV06apastgcu:9337: atrāpi pūrvavadityasya sabandhāt savyaṃ jānvācyāvācīnapāṇirityādi vidhānamihāpi bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:9341: etadvāṃ mātarāvasau yāśca yuvāmanu'ityādidakṣiṇāpavargānityucyate-ubhayeṣāṃ piṇḍānāṃ pṛthak dakṣiṇāpavargatā yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:9342: tena pitṛpiṇḍānāṃ dakṣiṇato mātṛpiṇḍā na bhavanti /
GV06apastgcu:9344: evaṃ piṇḍān datvā pūrvavaduttarairapo dadāti pitṛbhyaśca mātṛbhyaśca /
GV06apastgcu:9345_0: mantrasamāmnāye'mārjantāṃ mama pitara ityete'iti mantrāṇāṃ punarādiṣṭatvāt 'uttarairapo
GV06apastgcu:9345_1: datvā'ityeva siddhe pūrvavadityatidśaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñapratyavamarśanārthaḥ -piṇḍeṣu codakāñjaliṣu ca /
GV06apastgcu:9346: tata uttarairmantraiḥ tānupatiṣṭhate yathāliṅgaṃ 'ye ca vo 'treti pitṝn,
GV06apastgcu:9353: tata uttarayarcā 'putrān pautrānityetayātriḥ prasavyamudapātreṇa pimḍān pariṣiñcati . ubhayāstaparyantviti lṅgāt piṇḍānāṃ sahapariṣecanam /
GV06apastgcu:9355: prasavyavacanamanuvādaḥ prasavyaṃ triguṇībhūtamekameva pariṣecanaṃ santataṃ yathā syāt,
GV06apastgcu:9357: evaṃ pariṣicya tataḥ pātrāṇi yānyatra prakṛtāni trīṇyarghyapātrāṇi pariṣecanapātrāmudakumbhaḥ
GV06apastgcu:9358_0: yasmin piṇḍārthamannamuddhṛtaṃ tacceti tāninyubjyanyāñci kṛtvā tata uttaraṃ yajuḥ
GV06apastgcu:9365: evamabhyudāhṛtya śeṣasyānnasyagrāsavarārghya grāso 'varārdhyo avamā mātrā yasya tatgrāsavarārdhyamchāndaso hrasvaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9366: tatprāśnīyāt uttareṇa yajuṣā'prāṇe niviṣṭo 'mṛtaṃ juhomi'ityanenasarvatassarvabhyaḥ śrāddhaśeṣebhya annaśeṣebhya ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9382: atha pratyetya prācīnāvītī piṇḍadānadeśe dakṣiṇāgrān darbhān,
GV06apastgcu:9387_0: tatasteṣu darbeṣūttaraiḥ 'mārjayantāṃ mama mātaraḥ'ityādibhiśca yathārha dakṣiṇāpavargamapo
GV06apastgcu:9389: atra pūrveṣu triṣu mantreṣvasāvi- tyasya sthāne pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ nāmāni sambuddyā yathākramaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:9393: piṇḍadāna eva dakṣiṇāpavargaḥ'dvaidhaṃ darbāstaraṇeṣu tu paścimāpavarga iti jñāpanārtham,

GV06apastgcu:10537: paridhimiti vacanāt tasyāśmanaḥ pracyāvanaṃ na kāryam,
GV06apastgcu:10552: abhimṛtāabhimukhyena mṛtā yogyatayā jīvanta eva amātyānāṃ santatamaraṇadarśanena svayamapi maraṇādbhītā ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:10564: iti śrīsudarśanācāryaviracite gṛhyatātparyadarśane trayoviṃśaḥ khamḍaḥ asṭamaśca paṭalassamāptaḥ //
